I was given this blender as a Christmas gift last year because everyone knows I love to blend things, especially smoothies and fresh hummus.Pros---You can fit quite a bit in it-Doesn't cost very much-Has a glass pitcher instead of plastic-The bottom comes off for easier cleaning-For it's size, it sure is a lot quieter than any other blender that I've owned-It has multiple blending options to pick from-Pretty powerful for blending fruit and veggie smoothies and soups, as long as there's enough liquidCons--Collects of food under blade from time to time-Have to double check that it's screwed on perfectly on bottom, or it will leak-Not the best for making hummus, (maybe a better or alternate blade?)-HeavyWith a few minor adjustments, it could be perfect, in my opinion.

When you have a baby, I think it's really important to baby proof your house. Our house is pretty big, with quite a few cabinets and drawers. These locks are great. They look really simple, and yes they are simple to install where you need them. The adhesive is very strong and holds well on my cabinets. Then, you squeeze the tiny latch and lift handle before opening. It's not very complicated for adults, but is difficult for a young baby to figure out. Exactly what I was looking for.I like that they come in both pink and blue, a pack of ten. This is enough for most people, in my opinionI received this pack in exchange for an unbiased review. All opinions expressed are my own.

These are excellent. They're super plush and soft. They are some of the softest washcloths that my baby has and I love that. They come in a pack of 6, so you have a few to cycle through. This is a really good dish cloth. I use this one for my pots and pans. I have multi colored ones for my glasses, plates, and bowls.  They also work great for cleaning utensils. This is a darling little pacifier clip. My daughter rarely uses a pacifier, but she does use a few different teething rings. I've clipped a couple of her teethers on this clip for her. And it can be attached to their onesie or on the straps from their carseat/stroller so it won't drop to the floor and get dirty. These are seriously the cutest little bootie socks. My daughter is six months old and has small feet. These fit her comfortably, with room to grow. I bake and I grill food often. These are cool gloves because they are made from high quality silicone and are therefore resistant to heat. I've used them for both grilling and baking and they kept me from burning my hands. They have tiny bumps all over them that helps you grip things, such as a hot cookie sheet, pan, tongs, etc. This way you won't accidently drop whatever you just cooked. I've actually had that happen before. So sad.These also work for when you are taking baked potatoes or food that's in foil out of the oven or off of the grill. You can't feel the high heat on your hands.These are nice for almost anyone's hands. My husband's hands are larger than mine but they fit both of us just fine and there is still a tiny bit of wiggle room for both of us. I love that they are really useful and the fact that I can hand wash them or put them in the dishwasher.As for the meat shredders that come along with the gloves, I personally do  not eat meat, so I use them to toss salad or mix up some coleslaw. I love leggings. I always see people wearing the ones with the snowflakes and I wanted to wear some during this winter too. I am happy I received these because they are really cute. 1:59 Mins This mirror is actually larger than I expected it to be. It's big, but not too big. It can still fit into my purse or even a couple of my makeup bags. I love the rose pink color and the fact that the outside shouldn't fade and is scratch proof.It runs on 4 AAA batteries, which is nicer than it having to be constantly plugged in to the wall. I like that it can stand, but I do wish that it could stand a bit taller. The light that is on the bottom mirror is surprisingly very bright. I love the lighting for when I'm doing my makeup. The top mirror can magnify up to 5 times which is pretty great, especially when I'm trying to pluck my eyebrows or apply my eye shadow and mascara.Then, I love how it collapses back down into a regular compact again.This mirror is very nice, even though, I mentioned wanting it to be taller.Nice product to keep in your bag or to travel with.I received this product in exchange for an honest review. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

With all the cooking that goes on in my kitchen, we keep an abundance of plastic and glass storage containers. These are a lot nicer than the plastic containers that we own.Why?Pros- these containers have an airtight seal-you can force the extra air out-they have a date dial so you'll know how long food has been stored-they come in four different sizes-they are dishwasher, freezer, and washer safe-they are BPA free-they are stackable or can be stored inside one another-highly functional-very nice designI love having these in my kitchen. They are easy to use and really do keep my food fresh. My old containers had a lot of flaws including leakage, cracking, not being airtight, and not be microwave safe. These solve those issues. They will come in handy during the upcoming holidays when I know we'll be cooking even more meals and there will be a ton of leftovers.I received this product in exchange for my unbiased review. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

This is one of the most useful tools to have in your kitchen, especially if you need something to slice or shred up your veggies. It comes with multiple blades/shredders that can be stored in the separate little box. You switch them out by popping off the lime green piece and replacing it with your choice. You actually have to be somewhat careful when switching and handling the blades since they are very sharp. Once it's switched and on securely you can get to slicing. It does slice evenly and when the piece gets too small, you can use the "handle" to hold the veggie in place and scrape against the blade until done. It does save you some time since cutting with a regular knife can take a while.You can toss all of the pieces in the dishwasher which is convenient.I received this product at a discounted price in order to facilitate my review. All opinions expressed are my own.

I really like this cocktail shaker set. It looks nice, is big, and comes with everything that is necessary for mixing your own drinks at home or for work if you are a bartender. It comes with a shaker with strainer, a shot top, and a jigger. It's great quality too. I also like that it came with a little book of fun recipes.It looks nice in your kitchen or on your bar. I'm happy with this product. No complaints.I received this product in exchange for my unbiased review. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

Now, although I worked in the bar industry for several years, in the past, I feel that there is still a lot if things that I didn't know though about.  Bitters is actually one of those things. It's fun to come across a book like this because after reading  it, I've learned how to make a drink go from boring to new and fresh. A book like this would be perfect for a new bartender or even someone who just likes to make their own drinks. It's fun to try new concoctions and be able to serve them like a pro when you have company over.Mixology can be so much fun when you actually know what you're doing.One thing that I did learn long ago from working in this industry and it is also stated in the book---you can never make a drink exactly like the last. A drink will always be slightly different. One tiny difference can also make a drink go from not too bad to amazing.The recipes in this book sound very appealing to me and many of them will be tried out in the future, when I'm no longer nursing. I'm also looking forward to making handcrafted drinks and trying them out on other people and seeing how they like them.I received this book in exchange for my unbiased review. All of the opinions expressed are solely my own.

I like wine, but im in no way a wine expert. This book is nice and short, but also filled to the brim with the history of wine, from where it started, to how to differentiate by taste, smell, color, etc. It also talks about the types of foods to pair it with.I feel a lot more knowledgeable about the subject after having read this book.The next time that I purchase a bottle of wine, this, of course, will be the first boom that comes to mind. My favorite time of year is finally here and I'm always looking for new materials and ideas for my costume. I'm a do-it-yourself kind of person and prefer making my own, rather than buying something pre-made. I've always wanted to try liquid latex and now I have a bottle.This bottle is big enough to last a while. The consistency isn't very thick. It's thin but you don't need to use too much. It's true when they say little goes a long way. You can use this to make so many different creepy and creative looks. The only thing I don't like too much is the smell, but I have a very sensitive nose.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.

This nursing cover has a very pretty design on it. It is opaque and provides excellent privacy when nursing your baby. It has an adjustable neck strap and a collar that is round instead of flat so that you can see your baby as he or she feeds. That is my favorite part, especially now that my baby is older and doesn't like being covered much. With this, she can see my face and is content while eating. She can also breathe better with this sort of cover.I have a couple of other similar covers, but this one has a few nicer additional features. It has pockets, which are nice to store tiny toys, a pacifier, pamper, a couple of wipes (in a ziploc bag), or wash cloth inside, to take with you. It's nice to have that option so you don't have to get up and disturb your baby. Also, another feature my others don't have is the strap that ties around your back like an apron. This is good because it simply holds the cover in place better.  It's just one less thing to worry about since your cover won't blow away and expose you outdoors, in a windy area.It can be used as a car seat/ stroller cover or thin blanket for your baby as well.This cover can be folded up neatly and stored in the little matching drawstring bag that it comes with.I don't really have any major complaints, because this cover doesn't what it was intended to do. However, I do think that the part of the collar that rounds out could be a little thicker so that it stays round and doesn't fold up. Then it would hold up better.I received this product at a discounted rate for reviewing purposes. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

I've been nursing my daughter for a few months now, but her feeding patterns have changed quite a few times, so at times I do end up leaking again. I was using disposable nursing pads but I get tired of buying those over and over and tossing them in the trash. These reusable nursing pads are simply more practical. They come with a few extra so all I have to do I can just switch between them . Then they can all just go in the washer , get cleaned, and then are ready to be used again.The material on the pads is very soft and thick enough to help keep leaks from soaking through my bra and onto my shirt. They absorb very well. I feel more confident when I go out because I don't have to worry about embarrassing myself with a soaked shirt.I'm very pleased with this product. They're a pretty pink color, are the perfect size for excellent coverage, absorb well, are machine washable, and fit comfortably inside of my bra.I received this product in exchange for my honest review, since I blog frequently. All opinions are my own.

This game was okay at first, but then it got a bit boring. There are some very strange people playing this game who followed me around but different really talk to me. It was kind of funny at first, but then it got annoying. This game is trying so hard to be like the Sims, but I think that it needs a lot of work to even get anywhere near that level. You need to be able to do more, not just decorate your own place, have a few outfits, and talk to people. You need to be able to do more actions and go more places. Not as fun as I would have liked it to be.

I needed something like this in my entertainment room in my house because we usually have quite a few things that have to be plugged in and not always anywhere to plug them into. I like this freezer tray for freezing baby foods, yogurts, smoothies, and fruit cubes. They are easy to pop out afterward because the tray is super flexible. This is a GREAT ring sling carrier. It's thick and very supportive under my baby. She likes to look around, is always smiley and alert while in this or sleeping really well.  I am so happy to have this product. Bought this for my husband because of the price and also because I have one that's similar and wanted him to have one too.  Mine is pink and well his is black and white. Never owned anything like this product before. It's a personal water filter for when your out hiking, camping, or out in the wilderness somewhere and  need water. It's good for emergencies. I like the fact that this product has coconut oil and argan oil, which are two products that I use on my hair regularly.I actually tried this product on my son's hair since he loves to wear his hair in a fauxhawk. I applied it to his hair and it stayed up for about an hour. I didn't apply too much but I was hoping that it would keep his hair up longer. Even though it didn't keep it straight up like I had hoped that it would, it still kept his hair styled and looked cute on him. This product is a sticky pomeade so it does hold little hairs together well. It isn't stiff or thick, so this is why it won't hold it up for more bold hairstyles like I mentioned before. It does say "medium hold" though, so that makes sense.I do like that this product is not completely filled with chemicals. It's alcohol, paraben, and sodium-chloride free. That makes me like it even more, even though it won't hold his hair up. Less chemicals is always what I prefer, especially on my son's head.I received this product in order to facilitate my review. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

2:37 Mins This product looks a lot like a cool little watch, but doesn't tell time. It's like a pedometer that tracks your amount of steps, calories burned, and even tracks the amount of hours you sleep, both deep and light sleep. It will also notify you if you miss a phone call or text message with a tiny little flashing light. I think that this is a very cool invention.However, I don't know how accurate it is. It seems to keep track of most of what I do, but I'm not entirely sure if it gets every step or every hour of sleep.I do like at it notifies me of missing a call or text, but I wish the whole face plate lit up instead of just the tiniest little light. You can change the front to a different color, which is nice, and it is adjustable, so it should fit all different sized wrists.I received this product at a discount in order to facilitate my review. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

I love how great these glasses look in my kitchen. I also love the way that the glasses are designed. I really do like this handsfree headset. There are a lot of good things about it. It's wireless, fits snugly, yet comfortably in my ear, and is very easy to use. I only recently received this nursing cover and I think it's such a wonderful product if you are nursing and don't want a billion eyes on you while you're out. Not that I care what people think, since bursting id's 100% natural and my baby's gotta eat,but a cover does provide some privacy. My son really wanted to get my husband something funny for Father's Day and this is what he decided to get. He picked this one in green since its my husband's favorite colorEveryone thought it was such a funny gift and my husband wore it all day. It's now a comfy shirt that either of us sleep in.

I'm normally extremely picky about the kinds of shampoos and conditioners that I use on my hair. I prefer to use sulphate free products, if available. This conditioner, that comes in a pretty red bottle is sulphate free, has Argan oil in it, and has a nice scent. At first, after a few uses, I wasn't sure how good it was for my hair. However, after using it for a few months, I've come to love it. You see, what I do is apply to my hair gently, I do not rub it in. This is such a cool assortment of accessories for the car.First off, my favorite is the bright red baby on board decal. It's nothing like my old plastic sign with suction cups that would constantly drop off of my window. This one is funny and stands out. I stuck it on the window on the back of my husband's car. It has gotten a lot of looks and compliments.The seat catchers are nice because they fit in between the seats perfectly and can collect coins, receipts, can hold some pens or pencils, or even road maps. This book was a short, but fun read. I read the entire thing yesterday. How exciting it would be to have Mira's special ability to stop time, and also to read other people. Such a cool gift. I wouldn't know how to deal with those sort of abilities. I think I'd be scared to know what's on some people's minds, but the stopping time thing would be fun to play around with.This book kept me interested. I like books that circle mainly around a strong female character. She was young, daring, and tough. She's on her own personal mission and willing to face quite a few really dangerous people to get there.I enjoyed the book and thought it was a great way to draw me into reading the rest of the series of books. I love that there wasn't also a preview of what is happening next.I received this book in exchange for an honest review. All opinions expressed are my own.

This is such a wonderful product. It is the type of thermometer that I've been wanting and needing for a long time. It is very easy to use for either reading forehead temp or inside the ear. I like that it has a backlit and easy to read display too. It comes with a nice cradle to hold it in, as well as a little blue carrying pouch. It all fits easily in a bag for traveling purposes.This thermometer is great to have around, especially when you have young ones. I'm happy to have it since taking an oral temp is not always easy to do with my son and my baby is too young for that. Now I have just get a forehead or ear temp reading in a matter of seconds without any problem.UPDATE*****I've had this product for a few months now and it was working great up until yesterday. It is malfunctioning. We haven't damaged it in anyway. When I tried to read my baby's temp it kept saying 134 degrees and up. When I took my own temp it was over 270 degrees. I figured maybe it needed new batteries. I put new ones in and it won't even give me a temp now. It beeps and just says L and Fahrenheit sign. Really frustrated.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. However, all opinions are solely my own and in no way influenced.

Social media is huge right now. Practically everyone has either a Twitter account, Facebook, Instagram, tumblr, or other social media account. It's the "in" thing right now. I have every one of those and others.Although so many people use social media in one way or another, not everyone realizes just how powerful social media is today. Companies can lose a ton of buyers  if they receive even just a handful of bad reviews. People from one side of the world can read what people on the completely other end of the world think about products, celebrities, restaurants....the list is never-ending. The internet is so huge and is only getting bigger. Social media can be used for both good and bad.I like this book a lot because it tells people who are completely unaware , although that's a bit hard these days, all about the impact social media has. It's an eye opening book for so many people out there, I think especially for older generations. I will be sharing this book with the older people in my family who don't believe that social media can be so powerful. Very informative book, in my opinion.I received this book for reviewing purposes. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

This is a strong little stand. It can hold quite a bit of weight. You can place tablets, phones, and books of all sizes on it and yes it can support them. It can come in handy when you're watching a movie, shows, reading, and so on. It can even be angled to your liking.I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

This is by far the best biography I have read of Lincoln, and possibly one of the best biographies in general. Donald's unique approach is to tell only the parts of the story that Lincoln himself was aware of. So little is said of the Confederate government, since Lincoln generally did not know what they were doing. He does not dwell on battles, but only explains how they came about and what their effects were. The story is centered entirely on Lincoln and all that he thought and experienced.Donald does a wonderful job tracing an already familiar story and telling it in a new and thoughtful way. He emphasizes the incredible stress and pressure that fell on Lincoln as president. The frustrations were immense, yet he retained an incredible degree of wisdom throughout. Donald shows that Lincoln made some poor decisions early on, but quickly learned how to manage his Cabinet, generals, and Congress.This book will leave the reader in awe at Lincoln's brilliance, for such a humble and unassuming man. Even those who already revere Lincoln will find cause to admire him even more. This book is not a hagiography, but it simply highlights the challenges Lincoln faced and the masterful way he met them.

This is a fascinating book. Svenson bought a piece of land that had once been the site of a minor Civil War battle. This book is an account of his cultivation of the land, fitting into the community, and learning about the battle and the experience of the soldiers. The main narrative is about his taking care of the land. Interspersed into this is his accounts of various aspects of the battle. It is fair to say that Svenson became an expert on the battle, as his accounts are highly detailed and nuanced.Somewhat surprisingly, I found the narrative to be the best part of the book. His stories of building a pond, learning to farm hay, etc all are well written and enjoyable to read. His accounts of the battle, however, are dull and confusing. There are insufficient maps, too many minor details, all of which leave a muddled picture of the battle. I bought the book for the Civil War part of it, but thoroughly enjoyed it for his narrative. Depending on your interests, you might enjoy this book. But don't assume that every Civil War buff will enjoy it.

Symonds wrote this book as a sort of response the classic "Lincoln and His Generals" by T. Harry Williams. Symonds suggests that William's great book left out the significant contributions of the navy. So this book examines closely the role of the navy and its various admirals to the war effort. But, unlike Williams' great and enjoyable book, Symonds' book seems more disjointed and less focused. Perhaps this is because of the reality that the navy did not contribute as significantly or as consistently to the war effort as the army did. This means he had to spend several pages explaining the achievements of the army before he can explain how the navy contributed to their actions. This makes for dull reading for those who are already familiar with the course of events.This book does succeed in focusing on the role and contributions of various admirals. The intrigue and emotions of the Navy Department, the role of Gideon Welles, and the top admirals are all laid out here. Lincoln's dealings with various admirals is also well-addressed. While Symonds' book does not reach the level of William's work, this is still probably one of the best concise histories of the navy during the Civil War.

While Symonds' book does not reach the level of William's work, this is still probably one of the best concise histories of the navy during the Civil War.

"Alphabet Juice" was a pretty good book. If you haven't read that one, go read it first. Then I don't need to explain what this book is about.Okay, so you've read Alphabet Juice. Did you love it? Or did you just like it? I liked it, but I found this book to be more sluggish. More of the entries are obscure culture or literature references, rather than a light-hearted discussion of etymology. I found myself skipping the second half of more and more entries, something I rarely did in the first book. I found it less humorous and more trivial. This is all unfortunate, because I enjoy etymology, but apparently not to the nerd-level of Roy Blount, Jr.If you really loved the first book, then by all means, read this one too. But it might not be as good.

But it might not be as good.

The game itself is great. My wife and I enjoy playing this more than I thought we would. You have to match up two of the three numbers and the first one to get rid of their tri-ominos wins. Pretty straight forward game.The pieces themselves are very high-quality. They feel like ivory, though I'm sure they're not. There is a little brass tack in the center of each one, which seems pointless, but makes they look/feel nice. The numbers are engraved, so they won't rub off. The plastic trays are nice as well and easily fit 10 tri-ominos on them.The box itself is really weak though. Its a thin plastic and sags when you hold it. I'm afraid it's not going to last very long. It's so easy to have high quality boxes that it's really disappointing that they went for something so cheap when the rest of the components are really nice. I expect the game to outlast the box.

First of all, this is a really high-quality toy. It is well-designed, durable, and looks nice. It has a volume adjuster and plays 8 different clips of Mozart songs (listed below). The red side (actually shown as blue here, so not sure about why that is...) will play all instruments and change songs. But you can hit each other side to stop/start that instrument. So you can play just one instrument or any combination of them. The instruments include piano, violin, harp, flute, and french horn.This works really well and it's nice that it has 8 different songs, but even with that many songs, the clips they play are only about 15 seconds long. So they get really old really quickly. And stuck in your head as well.Songs include:- Non Piu Andre (Marriage of Figaro)- Country Dance #5, K.609- Come Sweet May, K.596- Ah! Vous Dirai-je, Maman, K.265 (Twinkle, Twinkle)- Der Vogelfanger (Magic Flute)- March in D, K.406- Landler, K.606- LaCi Darem La Mano (Don Giovanni)

These are really high-quality blocks with cool and creative images on them. The idea is that you can roll them like dice and create a story line by setting them back in the box they come in. There are colors that match them to the correct spot. So they you might have a story about a pirate and a frog in space during the summer. Some of the combinations are off-the-wall like that, but others can be a bit more normal.I'm not so sure that kids will really use the blocks for coming up with creative stories, but parents might. But even then, that might stretch the imagination a bit. Nonetheless, they make for nice colorful and creative blocks that are unlike most other types of blocks you might have.

This is a really big slinky dog. Like, really big. It stretches out to nearly 3 feet in length. The slinky itself is pretty firm, so it shouldn't get tangled or twisted. But it's not very "springy" and maybe it's not supposed to. It doesn't try to retract when stretched out. For fans of Toy Story, this is a pretty cool toy, and it's really big, which is fun for kids.But a couple things I wasn't too excited about. The dog looks depressed. The box shows a happy looking dog from the movie, but the actual toy looks like a miserable dog. Secondly, it has no structural integrity. It's head sags constantly. It's almost impossible to make it stand upright. It's just a really awkward toy. I'd probably avoid this one unless your kid is really into Toy Story or really likes this specific character.

Pretty straightforward "stuffed animal." It's bright blue and for the first little while will leave blue lint around your house. You could probably toss it in the dryer to help avoid that. But it's big. We have an 8-month-old and this thing is just as big as he is. The mouth has cardboard or plastic supports so it is always open, but can be made to close. The eyes are hard plastic. It's very soft and fun to play with. It's really big, much bigger than most stuffed animals, so it's a lot of fun for kids.

This is a very nice notebook designed to keep notes during meetings. Each page as a spot for the date, meeting topic, notes, and then a list of "action items." The cover is a soft material, almost like a suede. It smells like leather, anyway. It's very nice quality. I was surprised that pages weren't perforated for tearing out, but that's probably pretty minor. Good quality, nice notebook. Ideal if you attend a lot of meetings!

This is an awesome kids game that adults will enjoy playing. There are four train engines, many animal cars, and some moose cabooses. The goal is to build up trains based on matching colors on the edge of each card. Once you have a long train and a caboose that matches, you can play the caboose and take all the cards in that train (except the engine). The goal is to get as many cards as you can. You obviously want the trains to grow long, but risk someone else grabbing it from you. But if you take them too short, you might run out of caboose cards.This is a lot of fun! It teaches kids a little bit of critical thinking and strategizing. An adult could easily beat a kid in this game, but if you play nice it could be fun for both kid and adult. And certainly kids can play this on their own without any adult help.The artwork is great as well. The cards are better than most regular playing cards, but could easily be destroyed by little kids. It would have been nice if these were a stiff cardboard, but that's okay. Lots of fun!

This is a good deal for mouse-traps. And these are much nicer than the old-school wooden ones. Because the snap-bar is an L-shape, it allows you to lift it and release the mouse without having to actually touch it. That also makes it easier to reset and reuse. I've had great success with these. They are very sensitive and I've never had one go off without catching the mouse. They are powerful, so it's certainly instant death for the mouse (often the tip or flip because of the force). Not quite as nice as the Tomcat Press 'N Set Mouse Trap, 2-Pack, but still quite nice.

When our kid was born, we used mostly swaddling blankets. We had one swaddle outfit, but it was a heavy fleece, so not always the best. The problem with blankets is that even when they are tucked in right, a wiggly kid can often work them loose. These are brilliant because they use Velcro, so there is no risk of them coming undone. They are a nice, soft fabric and have subtle but clear patches where your Velcro should attach. They open up enough that you can change diapers in them without removing the swaddle entirely, but it's still kind of awkward.The colors here seem like they could be uni-sex, which is really nice. The lions are cute!The only thing that had us baffled was the slit in the back. Turns out its for harness straps for swings or whatever. On the one hand, this is brilliant for parents who want to have their baby swaddled in a swing. On the other hand, it's an odd, ugly hole in the back for parents who just want a nice swaddle suit for a crib. I've never seen other swaddle suits that have this, so I'm not sure how important it was to include. Anyway, they have nice patterns and designs and are clearly well-made. Recommended for good, light-weight swaddles.

The problem with blankets is that even when they are tucked in right, a wiggly kid can often work them loose. These are brilliant because they use Velcro, so there is no risk of them coming undone. They open up enough that you can change diapers in them without removing the swaddle entirely, but it's still kind of awkward.The colors here seem like they could be uni-sex, which is really nice for re-using them.The only thing that had us baffled was the slit in the back. Turns out its for harness straps for swings or whatever. On the one hand, this is brilliant for parents who want to have their baby swaddled in a swing. On the other hand, it's an odd, ugly hole in the back for parents who just want a nice swaddle suit for a crib. I've never seen other swaddle suits that have this, so I'm not sure how important it was to include. Anyway, they have nice patterns and designs and are clearly well-made. Recommended for good, light-weight swaddles.

The idea of mechanical colored pencils is pretty brilliant. I didn't think this kind of thing existed, but it's nice because I prefer mechanical pencils to begin with. This makes it far less messy for sharpening as well. These work really nicely and have a triangular shape, which isn't my ideal, but not a big problem.The only thing that I would consider a drawback is that compared to regular Crayola colored pencils, these are not as vibrant or bold when you are done coloring. They are much more muted. It's not a dramatic difference, but if you care about what you are coloring, you will notice the difference.

I haven't been able to give this a full grow cycle, but Amazon wants this review. So, it seems pretty cool. The LED lights are nice, but they are SUPER bright. I am tempted to put this in my garage or a closet, but that's probably not best. It's so stinking bright, it's awkward to have sitting around unless it's in an out-of-the-way room of your house (which I don't have one of those).But the pods that come with are very easy to set up and most of them sprouted in 5-8 days. The sensors seem pretty smart and able to tell you when it should be refilled, which is nice. You can kind of forget about it, as long as you pay attention to the warning lights.The light adjuster seems a little wobbly when you are raising and lowering it, but since you don't need to do that much, that's probably okay.It's supposed to produce full plants in six months, but you can start harvesting once they are started. The nice thing is having fresh herbs in the winter and because you only pick what you need, it just keeps growing. This is totally carefree, which is good for me, because otherwise they'd probably all be dead. Brilliant for people who like to have herbs but are too forgetful to water them.

We have this same liner for a crib and both work very well. Large spills, like vomiting, or wetting the bed hold up very well. They are not exactly the most comfortable thing to lay on, but our son seems to manage just fine. It's certainly better than the plastic sheet my parents used when I was kid that would crinkle every time you moved. It's easy to pull off and wash, which is nice. And it's fitted, so it won't slid around and crumple up like the crib liner does.Great product, just wish it was more comfortable to lie on.

Homeopathic medicine is garbage. Okay, I know a lot of internet-age moms are convinced of it, so I'll get some hate here, but there is no scientific evidence that it works. Hyland's itself has not provided any. And since none of us are scientific researchers, we cannot say with 100% certainty that it works. Sure, maybe you give your kid some medicine and he gets better. But that's not definitive proof. It could be a correlation or coincidence.With something like cough medicine, it's not that big of a deal because if it doesn't work, it might just prolong discomfort. But Hyland's is the same company whose teething medicine caused a lot of sick babies: https://www.sciencebasedmedicine.org/think-of-the-children/Rather than medicating your child based on the advice of blogger moms who have done a few hours of research, take the advice of scientific and medical experts who have contributed to over 200 years of research.

Other reviewers have already reported on the transfer speed of this SD card. But I'll concur that it is indeed very fast. And it's big. 64GB is great. I pretty much only use it for a DSLR camera, so it's nice to fit thousands of photos on there (or lots of video) without worrying about running out of space. We can fit a summer trip on here, plus plenty more space. So far it seems like a very reliable drive.

We have an Evenflo forward-facing car seat and just got this one for our other vehicle. This is twice the cost, but it is so much nicer. This can be a rear-facing infant seat, forward-facing baby seat, and toddler booster seat. The fabric is very nice and sturdy, and there is plenty of padding to make it comfortable. It has recline settings, so even forward-facing kids can sleep without their head falling forward. The recline lever is under their legs, so easy to reach for forward-facing.The infant insert is easy to remove and the seat belt is easy to adjust. The head rest moves up and down very easily. There are slots to put the buckles on the side when not clipped in, so they are easier to find (so your kid isn't sitting on them), but the buckles fall out easily and are more hassle than they are worth. The chest clip is annoyingly difficult to undo, compared to other carseats. Two cup holders, but work well for holding toys as well.Overall, we are very pleased with this carseat. Very comfortable!

This is really impressive software. It is best for artists, decent for graphic design, and okay for photographers. There are so many features, like others have mentioned, that the common user can get lost in it. For those who have experience using digital art software, this will be highly useful. If you're not experienced with it, this would be a rough place to start because it is so involved. This is really for the professionals. Some amateurs might find it useful, but there are other simpler programs that will suffice. Very impressed with it though!

This is pretty well-designed because it is durable, washable, and flexible. It can fit shopping carts, swings, and just about anything you might put your kid in. It provides both a clean protection layer, but also some extra padding that these things usually are lacking. You can even use it as a changing pad.But it's so impractical! It's very bulky and when it's unfolded, it's very large and awkward to carry around. We found that we'd rather just leave it at home and use a blanket or something. It's too confusing and awkward to figure out how to fit it in things the first couple times and unless you shop for hours on end (your poor child...), I'm not sure that it's worth the hassle.

This is what good conditioner should be. It smells nice, leaves your hair feeling nice, doesn't have too strong of a scent. And it doesn't cost too much. I'm not sure the expensive stuff is worth it, so this is a good option for something nice but affordable.

These are really good for disposable razors. I'm usually averse to Bic razors, as I've had a lot of bad experiences with them. But my wife uses these and they are very sharp, have a good lubricating strip, and ergonomic. Well-designed here and a big step up for Bic. Not much else to say, though. They look nice, work well, and don't chew up your skin.

I worked for seven years as a chef. I know how to cook. The idea of using a multi-cooker of any kind is sort of repulsive to me. I got this mostly because I thought I would use it as a rice cooker. But I have to say that I'm pretty surprised at how useful this thing is.I use it regularly to make Greek yogurt, steel-cut oats, and rice. It can bake cakes, allegedly. I tried one from the recipe book that comes along with it and it was tasty, if kind of ugly. It's great for cooking tomato sauce without it splashing all over the place. It can steam anything you want. It's pretty brilliant. I don't use it for roasting or searing, but you could. It'd be pretty useful if you were living somewhere without a stove.The lid is removable, which is a huge plus, making it much easier to clean.The touch controls are a bit annoying, not quite as sensitive as it should be, but tolerable.Overall, if you're inclined to use something like this, I think you'll love it. If you're not, you might be surprised at how handy it is.

I get frustrated with sleeping bags that are too short. I'm only six-feet-tall, so it shouldn't be an issue, but it often is. This sleeping bag happily was more than long enough. It's very cozy, rolls up compact, and is well insulated. It even has a pocket for your cellphone (which is nice for those of us who use it as an alarm clock). The hood fits well enough, if a bit awkwardly, and can be cinched tight. Although this sleeping bag is only rated to 40 degrees, which makes a "mummy" style hood seem a bit unnecessary.The only thing I didn't like was the inside fabric. It sticks to clothes or damp skin, which is really annoying. I prefer very smooth fabric that will allow you to move or reposition without it sticking to you. But a minor quibble.

How awesome are these?! The stiff-foam pieces are great for kids to play with on their highchair, on the floor, or in the tub. They are best in the tub (as intended), as they stick to the sides of the tub (and to each other) when wet. For toddlers, this can be a lot of fun. But even for teethers, the stiff foam is great for chewing on (though it looks like teeth marks could be permanent...). The mix of colors and the four animals are great. The flowers are a lot of fun to stick on your fingers, too. Very well designed and fun!

I typically use Gillette Fusion razors. Bic has typically not been nice to my skin. But I gave these a try, hoping they were better. But no such luck. I shave in the shower and Gillette blades work well for this. The Bic razors have no gel strip and the razor head has a lot of plastic around it. This makes it harder to shave tight corners or edges. These razors left my neck chewed up pretty bad. I might occasionally get a nick from Gillette razors, but never anything this bad. I would avoid these, as they're only slight better than disposable 2-blade razors.

Green Toys are fully recycled plastic. This is a great business model, making durable toys for either indoor or outdoor use. The one weird thing about them is the odor...they smell weird, though this is strongest when just out of the package and not noticeable later on unless you put your nose right on it.The scooper is fun to play with, though it takes more fine motor skills than little kids have. Still, it works well enough for picking things up and dumping them. Our son had fun with this even at 6 months, even if he couldn't really "use" it as intended. He also really enjoyed playing with the little bulldog driver that comes with. It's very durable and would hold up well outdoors or in sand.

Green Toys are fully recycled plastic. This is a great business model, making durable toys for either indoor or outdoor use. The one weird thing about them is the odor...they smell weird, though this is strongest when just out of the package and not noticeable later on unless you put your nose right on it.This is a fun toy as kids can put small things in the mixer and it will toss them around, however it is hard for kids to turn the mixer. I wish this were easier for small kids. Our son had fun with this even at 6 months, even if he couldn't really "use" it as intended. He also really enjoyed playing with the little bulldog driver that comes with. It's very durable and would hold up well outdoors or in sand.

Green Toys are fully recycled plastic. This is a great business model, making durable toys for either indoor or outdoor use. The one weird thing about them is the odor...they smell weird, though this is strongest when just out of the package and not noticeable later on unless you put your nose right on it.This is probably the best of the construction vehicles, as it is the easiest to control/operate. A simple dump bed is fun for little kids. Our son had fun with this even at 6 months, even if he couldn't really "use" it as intended. He also really enjoyed playing with the little bulldog driver that comes with. It's very durable and would hold up well outdoors or in sand.

Green Toys are fully recycled plastic. This is a great business model, making durable toys for either indoor or outdoor use. The one weird thing about them is the odor...they smell weird, though this is strongest when just out of the package and not noticeable later on unless you put your nose right on it.These blocks are big and great for small kids to play with because they are easy to handle. While they do stack and fit together well, they do not lock! That means they will fall apart very easily. A slight bump will send these tumbling. For small kids, that might be okay, since they aren't probably too invested in what they are building. But bigger kids might be frustrated by that.

This trundle bed is so cute. Please remember it does come unassembled so you will need a screwdriver to assemble it. It came with easy to follow instructions and I put it together in less than 5 minutes. The trundle part of the bed is basically a freestanding drawer that slides in and out but is not attached to the bed at all. It is a very cute design. I did have one issue when assembling the trundle drawer. On the side in the front where the screws go in, the little piece of board that the screws screw into broke in half. I used my glue gun to glue it back together. I noticed the other corners of the trundle were also starting to crack. This is likely due to the board being a little bit thin. Even so it was an easy fix and I know my girls are going to love playing with this. It fits the 18 inch dolls perfectly. For the price this is a really good buy even with the issue that I had. I easily could have spent double or triple that amount buying one from the name brand all stores. I recommend this product to anyone that has children who likes to play with the larger dolls. I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. This discount in no way effects my opinion of the product.

This is a great windshield sunshade.  I have a Chevy HHR and I have a hard time finding a shade that works for it due to the awkward size.  This one fits great.  It bends where it needs to and covers the entire windshield.  I recommend this popup windshield sunshade to anyone that needs shade in their car.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This armband fits my S4 perfectly.  I love that even when my phone is in the armband I can still use it.  It has an adjustable velcro band to fit around my arm.  When wrapped around my arm I like that I am able to get it secure enough that it doesn't slide down.  Overall, this is a great armband and recommend it to anyone that has a samsung S4.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I love this charger.  First it has one hard wired charging cord and one USB charging port.  I have mostly been using the hardwired cord (which is coiled).  I am so surprised at how fast it charges.  On a 20 minute car ride I got a 45% increase in charge!  When plugged in it gives off a soft blue glow.  I recommend this car charger to anyone that needs to charge their phone in the car.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

What a great product! I bought it to reduce the cellulite on my legs.  Upon the first application I was surprised when it put off a warm tingling effect (like IcyHot).  I read more about it and learned this can also me used as a muscle relaxer.  This is great as I have a lot of back pain and part of my therapy is to stretch my thigh muscles to relieve pressure on my back.  So now I have one product that has two uses!  I love it.  After about a month of use I do notice the cellulite I had is starting to diminish.  I recommend this product to anyone that wants to work on their cellulite.I receive this product as a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I love my eyelashes but not my eyebrows so I was super excited to get the LashScience growth serum and try it out.  For the first few weeks I used it twice a day on my eyebrows.  After about 2 weeks I started to notice new growth which was very exciting.  It's now been about 4 weeks and my eyebrows are definetely fuller.  I like that it is easy to use and doesn't have a harsh smell.  I recommend this product to anyone trying to beef up their brows.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This waterproof smartphone case does just what I needed it to do.  I spend time near water and am always fearful of dropping it and getting it wet.  Even when near water I still need to be able to use my phone.  This case gives me piece of mind.  My phone fits in it perfectly.  I tested it in water (without my phone in it) and was very happy that after complete submersion it was completely dry inside.  I recommend this waterproof smartphone case to anyone that would like some extra piece of mind when using your phone around water.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

Very nice car charger.  This charger hits all the checkmarks for me. Firstly, it has one hard wired charger for apple devices and then a second USB port to charge any other device.  I like this because I have both apple and android devices so I can now charge both at the same time.  It charges at a great rate, comparable to other car chargers.  When plugged in it emits a soft blue light that makes it super easy to find in the dark.  I recommend this car charger to anyone that needs to charge multiple devices at the same time.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I got these dental guards for my husband who grinds his teeth at night.  They were very easy to use and had easy to read instructions on how to mold to your mouth.  He said it was very comfortable, which says a lot as he's tried many different guards and not liked most of them.  They are made of a silicone type material.  We recommend this night guard to anyone that has issues with grinding their teeth at night.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

These are great pens.  I received the yellow ones and love them.  They are felt tip pens and perform well on a wide variety of surfaces.  I like that the pen cap has a clip so I can clip it to the page i'm working on if I have to get up before i'm done. Mine had 10 pens in it which I feel is a great deal for the price.  I recommend these pens to anyone that wants to embellish their photo albums.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I had so much fun with these lights.  I have been using them at my outdoor events, stringing them along the edge of my canopy.  The thing I didn't expect was to have so many color and blinking options.  They are so cute and the star shape is perfect.  I've gotten many compliments on them.  They are battery powered and take only 3 AA batteries.  I notice with decent batteries they last for about 2-3 hours if left on.  I am loving this product and recommend it to anyone looking to add a little twinkle :-)I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This iPhone 6 plus case by Thinkcase is so unique!  Firstly, it fits my iPhone 6 plus perfectly and is easy to take on and off.  What I really like about this one is the hidden card slot on the back of the phone case.  The gold color is gorgeous and i've gotten several compliments on it.  This is a nicely made phone case and I recommend it to anyone that has an iPhone 6 plus.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I have several Retsiliney products and I have had great results will many of them.  This eye firming cream for dark circles does just that.  I have prominant dark circles.  After a few days of using this cream twice a day i'm noticing a nice reduction in the darkness of the circles under my eyes and the fine lines are lessening.  It goes on very smoothly and has a nice scent.  I can't wait to see how it looks in the next few weeks!I recommend this product to anyone that has dark circles under their eyes.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I love these plates.  I run a small home daycare and we go through paper plates like crazy.  I refuse to let them use my dishes as they will break them and those plastic kids plates are usually not microwaveable.  I am so glad I decided to give these plates a try.  They are not only microwave safe but can be put in the freezer and dishwasher.  My kids love them as they are not flimsy and food doesn't seep through like paper.  I love them as we can use them several times and once they start to show wear I just toss 'em.  I highly recommend these plates for any occasion where you need semi-disposable plates.If you like this review i'd love a thumbs up!  I received this product at a discount for my 100% honest and unbiased review

There is much I want to say about this HDMI cable but that one word that sticks out is AMAZING!!  It is truly heavy duty.  Its a gorgeous blue color.  I don't have a 4K TV so I can't attest to how this cable would work with that, but I do have a several different HD TV's and this cable worked great on all of them.  The picture was nice and clear.  It is 15 feet in length which I found came in handy when I decided to rearrange my receivers farther away from my TV.  I highly recommend this cord to anyone looking for a heavy duty HDMI cable.If you liked this review i'd love a thumbs up!  I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This is the perfect arm band for me to hold my phone.  I recently started exercising and needed something to hold my phone while I was doing so.  This works great.  I can fit my phone and it has a little pocket to put my key in.  With the phone in the arm band I can still easily use the phone too, I was worried I might have to take it in and out to use but thankfully I don't.  The arm band is well made and fits a wide variety of arm sizes.  I have smaller arms and this stays put well and doesn't fall off.I recommend this arm band to anyone that needs their phone handy while exercising.  I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I often have pain in my lower arm from carpel tunnel and wrist supports just don't offer the support I need.  I decided to give these elbow braces a try to see if that would help control the pain.  It came with two braces, which is great for those that have issues with both.  They are fairly straight forward about how to use them. Slid it on your arm and them use the adjustable strap to tighten it.  It was very easy to do.  I noticed almost immediately the pain start to lessen in my arm.  I recommend these elbow braces to anyone that needs that extra support.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I can not say enough good things about this straightener.  I recently purchased a second one to keep in my spare bathroom for guests.  I got my first one three years ago as a christmas present and still use it everyday to straighten my hair.  The quality is supherb!  It is very well made and very easy to use.  I have long, frizzy, thin hair.  I love that I don't have to go over spots over and over again to get them straight.  One pass is all I need to smooth away the frizz.  This also comes with a carrying case, glove and a small bottle of argan oil.  I have used MANY different argan oils and this one is by far my favorite.  I have only used the carrying case a few times and it does what its supposed to.  I have never used the glove.  Overall I highly recommend this straighter to everyone!I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I have been looking for a memory foam rug for my bathroom a while now.  I have tried a few and they weren't what I wanted or needed. This rug was perfect for my small bathroom.  Its also not super thick so it dries quickly after I step on it from getting out of the shower.  Eventhough it is not thick it still feels soft and squishy under my feet.  I got the green one and it compliments my decor nicely.  It has rounded corners and a non skid pad underneath.  Overall I highly recommend this rug to anyone that needs a smaller size rug that has the perfect amount of memory foam.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

As i've gotten older my wedding ring no longer fits me. A few months ago my husband got the mens camo ring and this ring complements it really well.  I ordered a size 6 and it fits me perfectly.  It is very lightweight but doesn't bend when I apply pressure to it.  The edges are rounded so it doesn't pinch or cut into my skin at all.  Overall this is a great ring and I wear it everyday.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I love these tattoos.  I got so many compliments when I wore them.  These are very well made temporary tattoos.  They went on very easily just by applying to my skin then saturating with water, hold for about a min and your done.  They also lasted for several days which I liked.  The colors are vibrant and lines very crisp.  These are not you run of the mill temporary tattoos.  I highly recommend these to anyone that is looking to enhance their look with a very cute temporary tattoo.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I was super excited to get this as I have always wanted one.  I didn't realize that it wasn't a real newton cradle.  It really is more of a toy, which I didn't see in the description.  As a toy for a young child this is a great product.  The only thing I didn't like is the balls didn't line up exactly therefore it didn't actually work as it was supposed too.  It would only go back and forth for about a few seconds.I would recommend this only as a toy to anyone looking to getting their kid a cool science toy.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

My husband has struggled with jaw pain due to grinding his teeth at night.  In looking for a way to help relieve his pain we decided to get the Sweet Dreams Dental Protector.  We choose it because it comes with a case to put it in when not using it.  We were not disappointed.  It is very well made and was very easy to mold to his mouth.  The case is perfect.  Overall I recommend this product to anyone that grinds their teeth at night.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I am very rough on my cords as I usually have to wind around, in, and out of furniture between the plug and where i'm going to keep my phone.  This cord is very well made.  I love that it is three feet long so I have enough slack that I don't have to bend it too much.  The plug fits perfectly into my phone and charges quickly.  I recommend this product to anyone looking for a new cell phone cord.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I love using waterproof pouches for my phone.  It gives me peace of mind while using my phone around water that if I was to accidently drop it.  This waterproof pouch by Stalion is very nicely made.  I do a pre-test of submerging the case with a piece of paper inside to be sure that it truely is waterproof.  After taking it out of the water it was 100% dry on the inside.  It is very easy to get my phone in and out of the case too.  I liked that eventhough it was in the pouch I could still use my phone.  Overall I recommend this waterproof phone case to anyone that needs that extra protection for their phone while around water.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

This is a very well made jump rope. I am very tall, 5'11", and had no problems using it.  The handles are a hard plastic but a good size so they are easy to hold and don't cramp my hands.  The rope is resizeable by pulling it out the handle, adjusting the metal clamp and cutting off the excess.  The rope is the perfect thickness and weight.  While jumping I didn't feel like I had to really fling it to get it to go around and it didn't tangle on me at all.  Overall I really like this jump rope and recommend it to anyone that is looking for a nice jump rope.I received this product at discount for my honest and unbiased review

This is a great no nonsense pedometer.  I work out of my home and don't get nearly the amount of exercise I need to.  So I figured I'd get a pedometer so I can actually see how active (or sedentary) I really am.  This pedometer is very easy to use.  I like that it not only counts steps but also distance and calories.  I ordered the white one and am very pleased with how well it is made.  It is compact enough that it doesn't get in the way yet still big enough that I can read it.  It has an attached belt clip that I found very convenient for clipping to my clothing.  Overall I recommend this digital pedometer to anyone that wants to know how much they are, or are not, walking.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review

I have very dry skin and being that i'm now in my mid-30's, i'm starting to get a few fine line wrinkles.  This vitamin C Serum by Alina is amazing.  A little bit goes a really long way.  It hydrates my skin perfectly and doesn't feel greasy at all.  I love that it has anti-aging properties so that it helps keep any new fine line wrinkles at bay.  This vitamin C serum has a very pleasant smell too. Not only is it great at hydrating, i have also noticed my skin is a lot smoother when using this product.  Overall, I recommend the Alina Vitamin C Serum to anyone that is looking for hydration and anti-aging properties.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I can not say enough good things about these socks.  They are so comfy.  I like that they are wool but they are not super thick.  They keep my feet warm but don't make them sweaty.  I really like the cute patterns that I got.  I wear a size 8 and these fit me perfectly.  The band around the ankle is snug to keep them from falling down but not too tight.  Overall I recommend these socks to anyone that wants to keep their feet warm and stylish.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I have tried many different shower heads and rarely find one with the settings I want that still put out a good amount of water pressure.  This A-Flow shower head however did just that.  It gives me the variety of settings I like while still giving ample amount of water pressure.  It was super simple to install.  While it does say no supplies needed I would recommend using the teflon tape to help ensure you don't have any leaks.  All you have to do is unscrew your old showerhead and then screw this shower head on, that easy.  I really like the stylish look of this shower head too.  I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a better luxurious shower head.I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I've used TheraBreath perhaps around 20 years ago. They were probably a small dental office, but they already shipped worldwide. My goal then when I was in the dating scene was to have awesome fresh breath day and night. My problem was not really chronic bad breath, but I was sensitive to foods with high amounts of sugar including fruits. Any consumption of those and guaranteed my breath would not be as pleasant as the bacteria in my mouth feeds into the sugar. I was amazed how effective the product is but how much expensive it was.Fast forward to the present and look how big TheraBreath has grown. From the packaging to the product line. But one thing that hasn't changed is the price. I was hoping in a decade or so TheraBreath or other manufacturers will follow suit is mass producing the revolutionary concept then. It appears major toothpaste manufacturers are disappointingly not into this simple effective idea of highly oxygenating the mouth.Trying this TheraBreath Plus Professional Formula is like visiting an old friend. It's still as effective and revolutionary as it was back then. The good is they have a winning product and command of the market. The bad is that the price is still out of reach for the common people to work as an everyday product to replace the commercial toothpastes.Until they can bring the price down to competitive levels, people will always be hesitant to try the TheraBreath line and even if they do with highly effective results, the sad truth is it simply isn't sustainable economically.

Like everyone else wanting to be healthy, I consciously try to buy organic and/or one with natural ingredients. The current shampoo and body wash I use for my kids right now is the Honest line which isn't organic, but is claimed to at least be less toxic than say the shampoo and body wash we all grew up with.I had high hopes for the Natures Baby Organics Shampoo and Body Wash. For a scant 16oz and especially for it's price, I would have expected a great product that's thick. I would have imagined you don't need to use much and that the bottle will go a long way. I also would have expected great packaging.For the first issue I pointed out, the liquid was too watery I ended up having to use more. This means the product will not last as long as I expect it to be than the other products I use. You know that occurrence when you try to extend the life of a liquid soap by adding more water? It's that yucky watery feeling.The second issue is that the liquid content arrived leaking all over the box it arrived in. I can't understand why vendors think they can just seal their product with a cap. For an organic product, they don't attempt to place a proper seal to protect the contents first of all from contamination and then from leaking. Then there is the issue of the cap in itself not being water tight. So anytime the bottle is not upright during transport, the liquid will seep through.And that's what happened to this product when I received it. The bottle was wrapped in plastic as if the vendor already knew the issue and tries to resolve it by not securing the actual liquid from leaking out from the bottle, but by securing the bottle so it won't leak as much on the box. Well it did. I got a wet soapy box.The only redeeming factor is that the smell of coconut and pineapple is lovely. It's just a shame it's too watery and not properly and hygienically sealed to prevent tampering.

I didn't expect much from this Jackson Safety V50 Calico Polycarbonate Eyewear, but when these arrived I was surprised how awesome these look, feel, and are constructed.These are from Kimberly-Clark Professional division which I use their blue professional automotive one-time use gloves. So I trust 101% the quality of their professional division. And I will entrust the quality of the polycarbonate lenses of this eyewear to protect my eyes for it's intended use.The lenses come with a microfiber bag to house the eyewear. There is also an included garter strap to replace the ear stem so it can act like goggles and stay on firmly.I fully recommend this eyewear and am happy I found these actually exist than the usual eyewear I find at Home Depot. I will buy more in clear and tinted lens versions.

Holy peanut butter cups! This is 66.7 ounces of chocolate peanut butter goodness. That's 4 pounds / 1.89KG to you!It's the classic Reese's Peanut Butter Cups we all love in a smaller sized version. Disclaimer: When I say we I mean everyone that grew up with Reese's and are lucky not to posses peanut allergy.In any case, I love these individually wrapped smaller cups which I can store in containers at home and at work within reach from the keyboard.What made me refrain from giving five stars is that when I see the word miniature, I was expecting smaller single-serve cups. These "miniature" cups are still too big. Well, of course these are small than the original Reese's size, but I wouldn't call these miniature.I'm still waiting for the actual miniature cups. In the meantime, I am enjoying these small sized versions of awesome Reese's.

It's okay. It's cute to look at and it will make you laugh with your baby wearing the towel. However for the price of this towel I expected a lot more than laughs. I expected quality construction and premium thick cotton material. Instead I sewing of the "teeth" on the towel is questionable. They didn't sew it properly that two of the teeth are falling apart because the thread didn't completely touch on all the teeth fabric.Then more importantly the towel is a bit too thin especially for this price. I buy ultra thick towels around four times thicker than this one at wholesale stores for half the price. This towel is too thin I'm afraid it will get limited use from each laundry. The thinness makes it feel cheap.Overall the price coupled with the thin cotton material and imperfect sewing deserves two stars at best.

This is a fun product to have in the household. It's definitely for kids of all ages. My four year old kid is having fun playing pretend. Then when he's done, it's my turn to have some fun. I consider my hands in the Medium-Large range, and these Fists are big.What is it? It's actually simple molded fists made of soft rubbery foam material. You can probably throw punches at your Dad for making you do household errands. But do not attempt to throw punches at your Mom or sibling or these fists will disappear in no time.For the price, it's a great buy.Why not five stars? It's cheap and it's simple, but one that brings lots of laughs. The only thing lacking from getting full five stars is because the finger slots should have been built with individual inserts so they can all move independently from each other. Right now only the thumb section is separated from the rest. The remaining four fingers are stuck together so there is limited movement.It will make it more expensive, but it will make it more authentic in role play.

Not like how they used to make them.  I've been a Vornado fan for decades.WHAT I LIKE:1. I like the tactile snap on the rotating knobs that does the on/off and speed selection. It doesn't feel cheap.2. I'm also sold on the "vortex" concept of moving air by creating a stream of circulation versus just blowing air directly at you.3. I like the look which doesn't look like your traditional grandma's fan. If I have to own a fan, I won't be ashamed and showing off a Vornado.4. Tilting head just as all fans should be.5. Construction. Make. Durability. The plastic material doesn't feel cheap. The metal tubes will definitely than those flimsy metal tubes of other fans.6. Easy removing of grill via plastic tabs.WHAT NEEDS IMPROVEMENT:1. No more variable speed. Vornado used to make fan with variable speed selection. That was the best as it caters to virtually infinite speeds. Now you're stuck with only three typical speeds.2. Only three (3) speeds? I have a five (5) speed Vornado fan that still works like a charm. It's a trade-off for not having variable speeds. Three speeds is a joke really for something as expensive as this.3. No height adjustability. You only set a low or high height and that itself involves the extra tubing and a screwdriver. Once you have selected your speed, there is no more adjusting after-the-fact.4. Needs a remote control these days. Yes we can all easily walk at the end of the room to turn it on and adjust the speed. We can say the same for TVs. At this price it really needs a remote. You set it on one end of the room and control the ON/OFF and speed function wherever you are. No need to walk back and forth.OVERALL:I went from owning a Vornado and then thinking that by purchasing a Dyson bladeless fan was a move up. I tried to love the Dyson fan, but really couldn't get any practical use on it other than it looks cool and can belong in a modern museum display. The fans on them wasn't strong at all and was equally noisy.For the living room, I eventually replaced the Dyson and went back to purchasing this Tornado 783 stand fan. I admit it doesn't look nearly as cool as a Dyson, but this one does the job better and still produces the same amount of fan noise at high speed.I did wish Vornado improved on this fan as we hit 2014-2015, but was sad to see it was even more dumbed down with no variable speed, only three speeds, and still no remote control function. And at over $100+, it only deserves 3 stars at this day and age.

I grew up with snacks like Pocky biscuit sticks. I was excited to see that they finally jumped on the matcha green tea flavour bandwagon. Better late than never.If you're not a fan of matcha green teat taste, then this flavour isn't for you. Unlike other snacks that claims it's matcha flavour (calling Kit Kat) but basically drowns it with milk and sugar, this one definitely has a stronger taste of matcha in every bite.It's a bit of a change from the usual chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry variety. My kids and I love this.

Nice slim fit shirt. I have to admit looks better in photos than in person. I have similar shirts of darker hue and I wasn't expecting this to be too light. Of course each monitor is of different calibration so I can't blame the mistake on others. I kept the shirt as the fit is perfect. The trim tape accent is very subtle you'll have to do a double take. The collar and pocket hue accent is what makes the shirt though and brings elegance to an otherwise plain looking polo shirt if they were all the same colour with only the trim tape accent hidden beneath the buttons.

Fit as expected for a Slim Fit Fred Perry Polo Shirt. Nice baby blue colour accented with white polka dots patch set against a dark blue tone. Simple and classy. Calls attention to itself, but in a very discrete manner.

I like the Clek Olli and it was almost what I was looking for in a car booster seat. I like that fact that this simple booster has LATCH attachment so it doesn't go flying away in any situation. But a simple pull of the tether in front will release the seat for easy transport. I also got the leather seating option because although you can almost easily remove the cover, I'd rather wipe any minor spills without having to worry about it soaking through the material like my previous car seats.Not to mention the padding for the bum is thicker than any booster seat I've seen. My son hasn't complained yet with this seat so that's probably a good thing.PROS:1. Premium Leather material seating for easy cleaning.2. Thick padding for the bum to provide comfort on longer trips.3. LATCH capability. People also think just because this has LATCH that you cannot use it for non-LATCH equipped vehicles. If you read the instructions, it will simply tell you to tuck the LATCH anchors underneath the seating and use just like any normal booster seat.4. Surface material can be removed for a more thorough cleaning.5. Included drink holder.6. Included strap to attach to the LATCH for easy portability when travelling, if you choose to bring along this seat.CONS:1. Plastic rest handles look very ordinary cheap. It cheapens the whole look of this Clek booster seat. They should have designed it a bit better with even more high quality plastic. For $150, I expected a lot in overall design.2. Drink holder can only attach to one side - the right side. Why? All they have is a simple pocket hole to hook the plastic of the drink holder. They could have easily sewn another pocket on the other side. Again, for $150 this could have easily been done.3. More colours especially for the plastic parts. How about white for a start.OVERALL:Purchased this because of the great reviews. If only they improved on the functionality, design, and colours it would be an easy 5 star rating.

How about white for a start.OVERALL:Purchased this because of the great reviews. If only they improved on the functionality, design, and colours it would be an easy 5 star rating.

Like most of you, I've grown tired of constantly purchasing Gillette safety razors year after year. I thought each update of their razor would bring a better shaving experience. Perhaps. But still the razor blades would dull faster than you can afford to replace. I've been a Proglide user for years. Last year I was given a free Proglide Flexball. It didn't offer a revolutionary shaving experience. And the next catch of course is to continuously purchase the cartridges.So when my cartridges ran out I refused to purchase another set. Then I came across users of old-school razors.Then I thought to myself, if I were to make the switch and since the cheap blades will pay for the actual razor over time I might as well purchase a more expensive Merkur. So I looked at the Merkur Vision and Futur line. Especially the gold ones. I read the reviews and they all liked it because it was a Merkur not to mention the modern styling. But the complaints looked valid. The fatigue on the metal. The ability to change blades. The question it will last long.And that's how I ended up with the Merkur Heavy Duty Double Edge Razor 34C.PROS:1. Perfect weight. As the others have stated, you let the weight of the razor work for you rather than use it to press against your skin.2. Great size. The short handle for beginners like myself allow greater control over the razor.3. Awesome construction. All metal. I want to pass this on to my son not for being a cheapskate, but for sentimental value. I will teach him to shave with this razor.4. Easy blade handling. It's not as easy as the butterfly opening of other razors, but the two piece construction allows the blade to be grasped and changed safely. No balancing of the blades or mis-alignment as the blade will sit securely on the top part and you can just drop the whole handle on it with the centre guide. After which you screw it back on.5. Simple. No complicated adjustments to allow any metal to stress and break.CONS:1. The included Merkur blade to get you started isn't something to sing about. I find it a bit dull and I will be looking for something sharper, but still for beginners like myself. Possibly the Astra blades before I move up to the Feather blades.2. No protective cap. I wish Merkur provides a plastic protective cap to allow me to transport while on the road. A simple one similar to toothbrush caps will be best.OVERALL:I'm very satisfied with this razor blade. I'm glad I didn't go splurging like I normally do for a more expensive model. I was even thinking of this 34C in gold plating, but I also read reviews of the gold plate chipping and fading away which will make it look cheap. I want something that will look old school and last just like those without the tacky upgrades.

I would never have imagined to want a laminator for the home especially in this day and age. However, it appears with the digital age where printed photo preservation isn't the goal, I find myself looking for a laminator for my family's travel needs (luggage tags), kid's projects, as well as the occasional certificate preservation.INITIAL IMPRESSIONI have to be honest I was expecting a more compact device as well as one probably with a hefty metal shell.
