Rolling along with them on their relationship will push your buttons for when you are reading something good that is building between two that fits them. Hold onto your hats though she will drop a emotional bomb that will rip you into pieces as it does these two. You will then experience the agonizing climb back with your heart going out to them both. Don't take life for granted cause it can change in a blink just like it did for these two. Only love will be the fuel that feeds Gracie and heals David. They will then have to build something different that will plant more in the ole emotional garden of the reader as it happens. Struggles will happen but the power of love will be clearly shown in the relationship, and if you never let go it will do more than survive. I have never read this author before but clearly she knows how to reveal the heart feeding the reader as she does it, because seriously this novel is one of the reasons we read modern day romance.

It is quite delightful to discover another one of these gorgeous men that would tempt even the most shy. In this one this author gives you one dark and delicious man that ever since she was younger and her brother's best friend has been drawn too. Having had one memorable evening before he left he would never been forgotten. Now years later Avery is grown and needs a tow and her sneaky brother sends just the right tow and driver to pick her up-Severin. Having suffered many things from the night just before he left and thru the course of time he is now trying to heal following a different path. This author gives you their re connection with the chemistry that builds between them to make for one explosive coming together. Also this is one that can be quickly devoured but satisfies the need for romance. Also when you dive inside find out what she means by her title that would make a heart swoon.

What can I say but that this one is the best one yet. In this one it is like your favorite late night soap opera with everyone in the mix. You fall in love with Adrian and Victoria even more than before especially now that they are on the same page. She will give you more of Simon and Sadie but oh that girl does have a temper with having a right to it. My favorite now is Zev who could not understand how the others you could fall to love but he will be oh so challenged himself. Tara who comes in to tell him something about one of his players who just happens to be the one who is getting more bolder, he begins to be bewitched I would say with how he begins to act. Seriously though he will have a inner tug of war of his own that will leave you giggling a time or two. They will come up with a plan that will involve Victoria making the biggest play of her career that will have you going ah huh ah huh and pins and needles will be a better statement. Needless to say this author has surpassed herself with this one, but oh she will leave you wanting more because the game is not over yet.

Wow just Wow this final one just blew me away but also at the end I did a happy dance. From the beginning this has been different in many ways but have now learned that is how this author rolls delivering different. This one though out of all of them put me through the most in the emotional wringer. You know it is coming they say it is coming but you still will be unprepared. Rachel is so unique in character I have not read of anyone like her in a class of her own. The ones she is with go through to get ready, but the madman still will stick it to them all one final time. Of course she will after the horror they will witness make one final do or die bargain that I wanted to slap her for on the how. The action in this one will be draining for the reader. The sacrifices will be real and true colors will shine forth. Who survives and who doesn't will wish you had those tissues handy that were forgotten. The final pages will be the best of all with total agreement from me on that final decision or he would still have a hand in their destiny. I so thank the author for the ending it fit right with this and whoop whoop for Rachel.

With this one I had wanted to red for awhile now. I knew their time would come-Marina and Drew. This one also has the most poetic lines I think too. Of course it is not so easy either because Marina must remember. She will do that and more. Alexa is also getting closer to her destiny regardless if he wants her or not. this also tells more of the things about all of them then the proceeding ones that put alot of the pieces together for me for a better understanding especially as Marina understands. They have also some of their stranger events but they will be understood thanks to the pieces. This has been so far one unique and refreshing series with not one similar at all out there. I think also they have one of the most deserving times together especially since Drew felt it was better to stay away. The tide is turning and things are changing fast with the pace now speeding along with no down time. You will get a excellent meaning to this title when you read this one. There is one though in there group that has alot of resentment I would say if he wants to get over himself and what has happened to and behavior that has resulted where Alexa is concerned. Her time will come I just know it. You will also get to see some others in here too that were missing.

This time period is a good one and quite fondly reminds me of when I would read biographies of Queen Mary and such. So when I picked this one up and started it I could very well relate to how things were and how careful to stay in favor. Deception was all around and someone was always trying to disrupt and put on the throne whom they thought it should be as in this one the same events. This one though will have a bit more intimacy thanks to the characters and the story this author will give. Catherine will be thrown under the bus sort of when after her father dies and how he does. When she goes out it will start with her being falsely accused and on the run. Brandon will come to her rescue and as their adventure goes forth in the search for the truth they will also discover what lies within their hearts. Seduction in those days if between the right two could be like music but oh so thrilling. This author captures that with these two inbetween the intrigue. I was slightly surprised though with how she wraps this up a delight in itself with also how the wrongs will be made right.

Since this is the first time for me in reading this author I was rubbing my hands together in hopes of finding another gem. She knows how to get you right up front too with Micha who even though he was co-owner of a bar and a enforcer he bent over backwards to do right for his little girl. You could eat him right up or lap him up like a cat with a bowl of cream. Then there is Laurel who for not for lack of trying needs a summer job until her teaching job starts that her friend comes to the rescue and sits up a interview with her brother to sit with her niece. Wow is she in for a treat, cause he has no clue the real reason for the interview, sneaky sister of his. Anyways not all is lost and they come to a agreement but she must live with them. Now the hard part comes of the job, how to keep their hands to themselves. Delightful banter between them at times with him seeing just how much his daughter actually needed this. Actually in a way the sister came to the rescue for them both in more ways than one. Only one thing though he has a very tough side job that will get tougher and tougher. This is like bees and honey this one is because you can not quit reading. Since fear has a way of rearing its ugly head he will turn into a butt several times and at the end could cost him. Gotta love him though he can melt them bones beside just break em.

At first I was not quite sure of this one because of the title which leaned toward kinda silly to me but remembered era it was set in. By the time I turned the last page (not realizing it was already) I was flabbergasted because it had quite surprisingly swept me away. The era, characters, and the storyline combined with the talent of this author is what had me hostage for a few hours. That was only how long it took me once I picked up the novel and after the turn of the first few pages that is all she wrote kinda way. Abigal might have been a Lady who did her best to follow her parents wishes but she has character. Poor thing though had the miss fortune to be betrothed to a scoundrel who was called a gentleman in their circles who was good at hiding his jerk of a nature unless you looked closely. It only took one chance encounter of her happening on one of his indiscretions, with that action of his to later have some deadly action take place to set the ball rolling. I was so caught up forgot for a moment even the era not now so good the writing with the suspense of wanting to know who did do it and how soon can she get away from him. Now Edmund gotta love him the practical man he was who will get brought down by impractical thing called love. This had the taste of what got me started years ago with romance in this era but then were termed Gothic romance because of the suspense. You also will be literally holding your breath until you see all will be right in the end. This is most definitely one that will leave you warm and cozy.

I was really pleased with this Asus G751JY. I bought it because I'm a 3d artist, and was looking for something with a more robust videocard, ram, and harddrive space that was fast enough to render Iray in DAZ Studio 3d.  I priced several laptops, and they were all really expensive and less bang for your buck. Asus is a powerhouse, and works great. Yes it has windows 8.1 but I found after a few days I customized it the way I've liked it.  I tend not to upgrade notebooks from the OS They ship with, because I've had bad luck with drivers and support, but I have found this works fine with 8.1 with a few tweaks like restoring the start bar to a more normal appearance and disabling charms.There are a couple things I wish were a bit more clear. The documentation does not adequately describe how to disable edge swipe which is an annoyance on windows 8.1 There also really isn't a good trackpad control panel in the control panel windows.If you are looking to disable edge swipe it is on the task bar, so if you are looking for it (and I did for several hours). It  is on the taskbar and called Asus Smart Gesture.  You find it under the carrot menu.  To access it you must double left click to pull up the 8.1 swipe settings.Although the PC is new, I'm really pleased with it. This is a machine you might want to get if you are interested in a machine to do rendering and aren't Daddy Warbucks!I also wish there was a way to buy extended warranty from the manufacturer. The Asus site is a bit dated, and tough to find things on. But the price here is good.

I think this show is funny but the Jake/Santiago romance is irritating. I prefer them both single, and not pining for eachother every episode. There are only so many jokes you can do when the main character is hooked up. And the "are they or aren't they" is el bore-o.  Do like Boyle, Terry, and the captain, but not so into the silly on-again off-again  romance. It detracts from the fun jokes and ruins the chemistry of the show.

My iPhone cables constantly break for some reason, and so I was delighted to get the opportunity to try this. Setup is easy, just plug the device into a usb port or use a usb plug, like the ones you get with your phone. I found it charged my iPhone and iPad quickly without the fuss of trying to mess around and get the cables sorted out I also like the fact that it has a cradle and holds my phone and iPad upright while it charged.This is a nice basic that is working well so far.

I enjoy nature photography and images of animals and our natural world. This book looked interesting and seemed to be right up my alley. It is a hefty volume of pictures, but I felt it was displeasing in some ways. There was no order to it, the images seemed to be printed on odd kind of paper, and I felt it was cacophonous and disconcerting to look through- like someone took an image dump off a nature feed on facebook and printed the pictures out and stuffed them in the book. Yes, some of them were quite beautiful and well-done but I didn't find myself drawn into this book the way I have with other nature image books. The size and placement and paper quality didn't overly impress me either. This was okay. But not anything I'd find myself reaching for.

Increasingly, research suggests probiotics are good for you, and can help with illnesses such as seasonal allergies and allergic rhinitis. The over use of antibiotics has decreased gut bacteria in the regular human and made taking supplemental probiotics necessary. If you don't want extra sugar or calories from consuming yogurt probiotic supplements like this one are a great choice. This blend is especially designed to withstand stomach acid and to recolonize the lower intestine.I regularly take probiotics since I've discovered it seems to help me with my allergies. This blend has 6 strains  and does not require refrigeration. They are in gel caps made of vegetarian material and include some filler and stabilizer.It takes a while to notice and discern if new supplements are working. So far, so good.  The price seems a bit expensive, but you get 90 tablets which depending on how many you take is either a 90 day supply or a 45 day supply
This is an adorable 18 month calendar with beautiful chi puppies. The calendar boxes are large enough  to record your events. I would recommend this for those who love Chis!

This book is really a refreshing and funny read. It is basically about the sex life of sea critters. And believe me, this makes homo sapiens sex lives look pretty vanilla. As a person who enjoys writing, I found reading about the different ways sea creatures procreate to be interesting and enlightening. Who knew some of these creatures had such involved or curious anatomy. Lots of creativity for science fiction writer to be found in the real life sexual habits of sharks and other denizens of the deep.This book is not for the tame or staid reader. Sexuality is talked about in a frank and funny way. If you are offended by words like horny, or frank talk about anatomy and other words which might set off the censor here at amazon this might be a book to avoid.This would make a great book or tabletop reader for those who are curious about such things, someone who likes sea critters, or just that person with a great sense of humor who enjoys reading unusual things. Definitely worth a read. I enjoyed it.

My family uses a lot of plastic storage bags. We freeze and prepare meals, and extra food constantly since we tend to buy meat and food in bulk. This is a good value, especially with the number of bags you get. We particularly like the Maxlock Track  feature. It is very strong and keeps the bags zipped tight.To test this out, we froze several dishes including, filling for stuffed peppers, tomato sauce, and other liquid. It contained and held quite firmly. My mother in particular likes how easy they are to seal. We'd buy these again.

I bought this for my 90 year old father who has dementia. He loves looking and reading through it and has so far gotten hours of enjoyment from it. This book is beautiful and being National Geographic you know it is quality.  I would recommend this book for seniors to engage their minds and interest.

This was a fun, attractive, easy to use mouse, and affordable too! It connects quickly to my windows 7 notebook over wifi, and comes in a variety of colors if that's your thing.  It fits nicely in the hand, and could be easily slid into your notebook carrying case for transport.Setup is easy... Just connect the dongle, and your machine (if connected to the net), will find and install the driver. When done, you can remove the USB dongle and store it away underneath. It has a 30 foot range too, although I'm not sure I would ever need that.Nice!

I have allergies, and dry nose and sometimes asthmatic symptoms. I find that having a cool mist humidifier in my room helps me sleep better and breathe easier- as long as there is not too much humidity. I've been using a Remedies Cool Mist Humidifier which I quite like, but wanted to try a different one. Vicks Sweetdreams  is quite a bit bigger than Remedies. It is easy to load with water, and makes a pleasant cool stream of wet air. It has no noticeable odor.The projector is cute, but due to the location is rather awkwardly placed. The pictures are pretty, but the star ones seem a bit lame. With the projector at the back, it is awkwardly situated because some images project upside down and to get them right-side up you must turn it around Overall, I found it worked pretty well. It could use some design improvements mostly due to the location of the projector and the sound it makes when running.Updates: After using this for a while I found even with earplugs the sound of this device is far too loud. If you are a light sleeper this will keep you awake.Pros:Nice sizeCute projectorOdorlessEasy to useCons:NoisyProjector could be better placed

This is a large, colorful plastic ball that you insert treats into. As the dog plays with it, the treats are 'leaked' out onto the floor. Unfortunately, I found that there was just was not enough resistance inside the ball, and when the kibble was placed inside, it pretty much pours out too quickly. The dog was able to get most of the kibble with a few spins. There needs to be more resistance, or the ball has to be designed in such a way that it is a bit tougher to get the kibble out.

I thought this was plain and cheap looking and not really up to Lenox standards. It is a snowman with a giant snowflake inside the belly. Shaking/swirling it makes the artificial snow swirl around. It is rather average quality and did not hold anyone's interest for more than a few seconds. It might be better if it played music, but it just seemed kinda boring. Lenox usually stands for quality, but I thought this was clearly a b-grade product that you might find at Ross for a few bucks.

When I first tried this I was skeptical. It seems a bad idea to put essential oils in your nose, let alone ginger. But I tried it a few times, and found it had a nice fairly decent drying effect.Over time, of about 1 week, I found that it really irritated my right nostril. It seems it either caused a sore spot or created sinus irritation. Even though I have discontinued use, it still hasn't fully cleared up.At this point, I can't recommend this product- which is too bad since I ordered a refill before I noticed the irritation had begun.

I really enjoyed sampling all the flavors. I thought the packets could be bigger. You really only get enough batter for 5-6 normal sized muffins. The cheesecake flavor wasn't my favorite, but I really liked the others. Worth trying for the sampler-sized assortment.

I was surprised I liked this so much, given I am not normally a fan of milk chocolate. But this was smooth and creamy and tasted great with the fruits and nuts. This was definitely a treat, and had the feel of expensive rich and decadent chocolate. The size is quite generous, and it is more than enough to last me a good long time. I would certainly purchase this chocolate bar again.

This is a visually appealing and beautiful keepsake music box by Lenox china. The box is nicely made, with an appealing beige base, and the typical Lenox china holly pattern. The space for trinkets is on the small side. Big enough for a few rings, a watch, or some coins, but not enough for major storage. This item would make a nice gift.Cons: I don't like the tune: "Oh Come all ye Faithful." As Christmas tunes go, it just isn't Christmassy enough and since the tune is somewhat repetitive it needs to go on longer, with more variance. The tune was short, and after hearing it 10 times I certainly had enough.. I think a different tune like Silent Night or Deck the Halls would be more recognizable, or better still, it should have more than one tune.My mom and sister both liked it, but Mom was a bit surprised it only played only a few bars of the same song. Repeatedly.Overall, this is a nice basic. It isn't perfect, it should be larger to qualify as a 'box'  but it is nicely made and charming to look at.

This is a tiny, small inexpensive made portable demi-netbook, suitable for a child or someone whose computer needs are focused on internet activity or someone who doesn't have the money to purchase something more durable with a larger screen.  It came pre-loaded with windows 10, and full of software 'free for a while' that you will have to pay for after the subscription period ended. It is not super fast, but not super slow, although my 5 year old dell runs faster. For me it is functional, but closer to a toy than a piece of serious hardware. But if you take into mind the audience you are purchasing it for, it might suit a certain type of user. Someone who wants to chat, check facebook, browse Amazon, and whose vision is great, might do well on this small tablet-sized machine. For a person trying to do more, this machine might be too limited.It boots, and immediately wants to find your wifi router. Connecting to wifi was simple and easy. I was on the internet in minutes, mostly because I had to add this machine's mac address to my mac address filter.Looks wise, it is cute. It is bright blue plastic, resembling a toy computer. The keyboard is responsive, the track pad is a single piece, the screen narrow and tiny but appealing with a backdrop of pre-selected icy snow.I probably wouldn't purchase a machine like this, as I need more robust power, but if you are looking to gift grandma with a computer to check her email this might be something you might buy- as long as granny has good vision. I would be concerned about using this for children, as it is a heavily internet reliant piece of hardware, but that's each parents decision to make.This machine doesn't blow me away, but it isn't bad either. It is a solid piece of technology for what it is.

Designed for hard floors, the Bissel Symphony is an easy-to-use all-in-one steamer/mop vacuum with the punch to knockout dirt as well as to steam and mop up afterwards. Setup is easy. Just attach the handle, and plug it in and add water to the steamer using the provided cup. (or in my case, there was no cup for some reason, but a measuring cup worked just fine).The steamer works great out of the box. I filled the mop's reservoir and took it in the kitchen to begin mopping the pergo. It performed well- without chemicals or nasty smelling floor cleaners. It didn't even disturb the dog who was taking a nap. I made sure to keep the steam on lo, as the directions suggested.Switching on the vac device, turns on a powerful vacuum which will suck up dirt before it gets to your mop pad, which is very nice too. So this isn't just a steamer, but a vacuum as well.The instructions are a bit vague on some areas on how to use the device. For example, after use, do I clean the mop pads? (I assume yes, but it really doesn't say)  Do I leave them damp on the bottom of the mop? What? Where can I buy more pads? How much wear use can I expect to get out of them?I can see I will get a lot of use out of this, but wish there was a bit more detail on day-to-day operation.

I love dark chocolate and it pains me to write a review about a a chocolate product that I don't like, but I admit I found this chocolate rather plain, tasteless, and waxy. I couldn't taste the extra fruit in this, and it reminded me of my early childhood attempts to eat baking chocolate- sort of awful, strongly chocolate flavored and unsweetened. While I certainly am a fan of less sugar in products, I do want my chocolate to be somewhat sweet, and this tasted very unsweetened and not very good.  The fruit and nuts, were interesting partially embedded and not covered with chocolate but it gave the product an unfinished sloppy look.After tasting a few squares, I had my mom taste it, and she agreed, it was sadly plain. We didn't find it to be worth the calories.

I picked these up thinking they might make a nice alternative to the sugary treats I usually prefer. I like pretzels, and I love garlic and parmesan, but I found these too salty for me. I can see putting on weight just because of consuming so much salt. Now if there was a low-sodium version I would be all over this. But to me the salty taste in addition to the parmesan and garlic- it was too much.My family agreed. The bag was left unfinished on the counter.

I have allergy to dust mites, and pet dander, so I was excited to get a vacuum that can help me with dust. Where I live- central California the weather really lends itself to dust mites since we don't get a lot of cold weather.This vacuum is really durable. Right out of the box all you do Is attach the front brush attachment and it is ready to go. It even had enough of a charge for me to get  cleaning right away. The instructions have a lot of warnings about what not to do with the vacuum... (Do not run it while operating a vehicle.... Really?) But don't have a lot to say. I read through them anyway. The info about cleaning will be useful. Anyway, I used it right away on the couch, sofa and cushions where dust mites lurk. It really has a lot of sucking power and I noticed that dust was getting removed quickly as I was using it. I found it great for removing the dust from furniture, cracks, and some chairs in the kitchen.  I really like the way it handled, the sucking power, and the feel of it working.The only negative I found with it, is it wasn't strong enough to remove pet hair sometimes. It was a bummer to remove dust and leave the little white pet hairs behind. That is why I dropped it down one star.Overall, though. I liked it. I will be using this again and again.

I purchased this based on the outstanding reviews, but so far, it has done nothing for me. I notice no reduction of allergy or asthma symptoms. I will finish the bottle, and if it still does nothing, I will take further action. This product is too expensive for zero effectiveness. If it does ever work, I will update this review. But so far, it seems like the only thing this product can do is lighten my wallet. I'm not pleased.

I have allergies and a history of asthma.  I  own a number of air filters for work and home.  This air filter  seems highly recommended, but I'm honestly disappointed that it really gives off a strong plastic smell when running.. The device has been running now for two days, and it still gives off an offensive plastic scent and god knows what VOC's. I have to keep the window open and let it run and leave the room because the smell is awful. That is really tough for people with chemical sensitivities and asthma. Ughh... Couldn't these machines be off-gassed and ran before sending them to people who have allergies?The strength of the air is appropriate for the size, but I can say the charcoal filter is not working because when I return home from running it with the window open.. My room smells strongly of plastic. It fails to even filter out it's own odor.At this point, I can't recommend it.  I can't use the device at all or be in the same room with it. How frustrating. I can see it will need an extended off-gassing period. No good for me.This would likely be okay, if you aren't sensitive to plastics, although I am skeptical of the healthfulness of anything that off-gasses and is made of plastic. I'd be careful using this without testing or knowing if the individual who will be using this can handle the strong odor it emits.

I am a quilter, sewer and artist  and we use scissors a lot in our home for various projects and to open packages. This is a nice basic set of scissors suitable for household use. They come with a molded plastic handle made of recycled plastic and new blades. This is a nice basic set. It isn't the most high-end set of scissors, but suitable for day-to-day use. I would use a pair of scissors like this to keep in the kitchen drawer, to open packages, mail, and for the odd small project. I would reach for more expensive scissors for sewing, and other more detailed crafts. So if you are looking for a basic pair of scissors this would be suitable to purchase.

Basic plain fare, made by American company Campbells and sold in 120 countries worldwide.  This is something my 90 year old father will certainly eat, which is great, made even better by the fact that it is organic, and in a nice recyclable container. Is it the best soup ever? Certainly not. I find it somewhat bland. But it is satisfying, nutritious and plain. Great for those who like simple plain food from a brand you can trust.

These work well. When stress or anxiety takes it's toll, these pills really help calm your racing mind, or anxious thoughts and get on with your day.Like most people, I have a pretty stressful life. Bills to pay, a parent's and siblings with issues, and sometimes tense situations at work. Recently, it became a little much for me. My doctor says I need a vacation- which is true- but right now, I'm just not financially set up to go anywhere.I already have insomnia, and I was finding situations causing me anxiety, or tension. Initially I took 2 of these, but found that I really only need 1 in the morning before work to get me started on my day. I feel these pill really work in conjunction with exercise, hypnotherapy relaxation techniques.I do think that they may cause increase of slight acid reflux symptoms. Which is why I'm only taking in the morning with food as directed.I highly recommend these if you are feeling strain or stress.

CONTAINS SPOILERS--- You are warned.I like Sharon Fisher's sci-fi ideas, but I actually don't like the romantic elements.This story, features Tess, a scientist who works at a paranormal institute studying trapped victims from a parallel world. She is compassionate, kind, but a bit scattered. There are two men in the story, although only one is slated to be the romantic lead. Ross, the stodgy by-the-book FBI Agent.Story-wise I liked the idea of an alternate reality. I think this would make a great idea for a film. I did find elements of the energy transfer to remind me a bit of Jacqueline Lichtenberg's sime~gen series..The romance was pretty bad I though (hence three stars). Ross was just this boring over-protective type. He does his best to protect Tess from herself, and seems happy to go along with the FBI's bad plans for Jake and the other Echoes, and if he wasn't in love with Tess, I get the feeling he would be working with the government to turn them into assassins. He wasn't awful but I found him wooden and stereotypical and wrong for Tess.Tess runs away from her problems, and although she has a kind heart, she has a history of abuse and falls immediately for Ross, disregarding Jake who seems quite a nice option.My primary reason I didn't like Ross/Tess, was that I would like to see Tess grow as a character and away from needing a masculine protector. Her abuse was sad,  but it would've been more fulfilling at least for me to see her grow out of needing someone to look after her. I also felt that Ross seemed a bit cold and reminded me a bit of Tess's evil father.The romance is shallow, with early sex, and no real reason for it, thus it never really took off for me as a romance. . The love triangle with Jake is a tease that goes nowhere, didn't really work, and reminded me of the other novel by the same author with the friendly bearded best-friend character who was also in love with the heroine.I think I would've liked it more as sci-fi series with a longer character arc, and a different type of relationship between the protagonists.

I've tried this for a while. It seems to have some minor effects of preventing me from sniffing nearly as much as I usually do, but othertimes I feel it can make me congested when I wasn't previously, especially when I spray it before bed. I'm going to say this is probably no better than using saline up the nose for allergies.

This is a good series. The art wasn't my favorite, I preferred book 1 pencils, but the plot was interesting, and showed some nice build-up. I do admit, I really want to see Apollo. But hopefully drawn better. Sorry guys. The pencils made every character- especially face look kind of overdone.

Halloween and holidays are big in my house. We love to decorate according to the season and the current holiday. This table runner is super cute, and is covered with cobwebs and cute little lacey spiders. It is also machine washable, although given it's delicate nature, I would hand wash and lay out to dry. This would be excellent for a Halloween party, and it folds up to a small size so you can easily store it for next Halloween.Very cool. I'm so glad I have this.

I love head and shoulders but the smell of this shampoo is way too perfumy. It doesn't smell like coconut at all but smells like bad perfume. I can still smell it hours later after using it and it stinks. I'm sad I'll have to throw it away but it is too strong and not good at all.

This is  a fast enjoyable read with excellent art. Midnighter may have started as a batman parody, but he is rapidly one of the more interesting men in comics. Thought the action was fast-aced, and liked the character. Can't wait for issue #2, and a better explanation as to what happened between him and Apollo.

So far, I haven't noticed any decrease in my post nasal drip or my allergy symptoms. I still seem to get better results using the neti and the Flonase. After reading all the great reviews, I had hoped this might work out for me. But so far- all it has done is cost me money. I will update this review if I can get attributable results.Update:I was starting to get an upset stomach and discovered it was this product. If you have a sensitive stomach I would BEWARE before using this.  One of the reasons I wish I could try a sample of a product before buying.

This device is a blue light treatment wand for mild to moderate acne. It is not for use near the eyes as usage of this device near your eyes can cause blindness. The device is easy to use, with short one day treatments monitored by a charge module. The device is a comfortable weight and size, and comes with brief directions for  setup and day-to-day precautions. A set of goggles for blue light might also be advisable for areas close to the eyes, but not near the eyelid. The only downside that I can see is that the company charges for 'charges'. This is not a standalone device. To continue to use it, you will need to pay for additional charger modules. I don't like that. this device is already fairly pricy, and charging for charge refills seems a bit much.Actually using the device, involves plugging in the charging module/cartridge, charging it until it is full, and then applying to the affected area. you can use stickers on your face to guide the direction of the wand, but that didn't seem too helpful to me. The device switches off when the session limit has been reached. The devices switches itself off when it is not in contact with the skin.

I picked this one up because I was intrigued by schoolteacher solves a mystery and that I heard it was basically a 'gay Stephanie Plum novel.' It sounded kind of funny, as I really loved the early Stephanie Plum books and they were comedic. Well, I didn't find the story that funny, and Skyler was a bit of a spaz. His friends were just kind of off-beat characters. The romance between Skyler and the football coach was telegraphed, and I just wasn't feeling it. I don't know why.  Perhaps I thought it would be different? I never really engaged in Skyler's life or his character.

I have allergies pretty much all year round. I use nasal steroids which I would prefer not to take. This is basically salt water with a few herbs in it. While it didn't hurt me, it did nothing to ease my allergies in the slightest. Although I like the idea of homeopathic remedies I've found most do not work at all for me. This one was ineffective.

I bought this because it has been unseasonally cold this year. I wanted a parka, and this is the only one I thought looked interesting. The sizing runs VERY small. I am about a size 16, and I like my coats roomy to go over other clothing, and I ordered the biggest size and it fits, but there isn't much room to spare, and the sleeves are just a touch too short.I'm keeping it, because returns are a pain,and it does fit, it's just that the sleeves are made for a shorter person, and the size could be roomier.I wouldn't say it is awesome, but I do like the way it zips up and it has a nice hood that protects your lower face.

These are buffered Vitamin C tablets, and even though they were made for kids and buffered, they still irritated me. I am sensitive to Vitamin C so if I do consume any it must be buffered. I'll have to try a different brand.I didn't feel the taste or texture was anything too exciting...

I've been using these for over a month now. They taste good, and they are enjoyable, but I can't tell if they actually do anything at all. If I find any positive effect I can attribute to this lozenge I will update my review.  But right now, other than providing a tasty treat, I'm not noticing anything.

I want to state, that this was effective for me for the two days I took it. I felt it really controlled my allergies drying up my nose.  However, I was sensitive to one of the ingredients, and I found after taking it, that my eyes itched, my tongue felt sore in a few places and I had some body itchiness. I think it was the Histaminium. I think I am sensitive to that ingredient but it is hard to tell. Too bad, most homeopathic remedies contain it.The itchy tongue and body itchiness went away after I stopped using this med- but I found the eye itchiness has continued to bother me for now.

In my opinion, Electrolux produces the best stick vacuums you can buy. This vacuum, is perfect for the small home, or for use in an apartment or location where a full-size vacuum isn't necessary. It is easy for seniors to use and charge, the rollers don't get gunked up that often unless you have long-haired pets, and they are light-weight and perfect for using in places where a quick vacuum will touch up a floor, and are yet easy to use and store. It is also a rather attractive looking unit, with a nice profile, and a deep dark red.This vacuum doesn't have a complicated stand (although you can buy additional accessories), and can be put together in a matter of under 5 minutes. The charger goes into any standard plug, and the adapter plugs into the back handle.Like most stick vacuums, you will have to expect to empty the cup, and tap out and replace the filters every so often. But this isn't too difficult. The handheld vac detaches for quick cleanup of spills or small area cleanup, like blinds, windowsills, or corners where the regular vacuum is too big.This would be a great gift for someone going off to college, a senior, or to keep in the closet upstairs for touching up the bathroom, living room, or stiars.

This is a soft plush carpet in darker colors and earth tones, suitable for a small entry rug, bath area, or small location.  I liked the look and feel of the carpet. It seems well made, and felt soft to the touch. We thought it blended nicely with our existing dcor which is South Western. I have two compliments on it already being beautiful.The only negative is there was a slight chemical odor which you can smell. The product is made out of polypropylene.

AA batteries are a staple of the industry. Finding good ones that last a long time, is always a plus. It is great when you can find a product that lasts longer and means less waste. Unfortunately, as much as I like the idea, reusable batteries just don't seem to have as long a life as pre-filled disposables as long as you get the right brand.Fusion promises a longer life for their batteries. And so far, this has proven to be true! I haven't had to replace any of my fusion batteries yet.These are useful and affordable. It is plus to me that this is also an American company from Wisconsin.

This is an interesting item- a spray to coat your sinus and prevent allergens from irritating your nose and causing allergies.The first spray actually worked. It had however, a strong minty scent and flavor which sort of annoyed my throat.  However, I found that the second time I used it my right sinus also became irritated. I also was not terribly keen on the rubbery bits of odd stuff which come out of your nose when the coating begins to fail. I'm not sure how good that is for you.I liked the idea, but the throat/nasal irritation was unwelcome. Also mint is pretty bad for people who have acid reflux. Wish they'd avoided that scent/flavor.

I've never tried fondant before. I usually make or by store bought frosting. This is different than that, it is a decorative roll-out sort of frosting-like dough you can use to sculpt your cake decorations (such as flowers, circles, pumpkins etc). The dough itself is very malleable. It looks and tastes a bit like vanilla.  It can be dyed with the use of food color. The dough itself is easy to work, with a very smooth and malleable texture.This would be a great rainy day cake decorating project or something to enjoy with the kids. I would certainly buy this again if I was in need of a cake with beautiful hand-made decorations.

This is a slick nice new depend underwear for active women and seniors. My elderly mother has lately begun to wear depends for occasional leaking, and she described these as perfect. The fit was described as 'fitting better' than regular depends, not being as bulky and having smaller pads which she preferred over the regular kind. They also look nicer as they have a less diapers appearance,and come in colors that look more like panties.  I was pleased with the quantity included in the box. We certainly will be purchasing these again.

I bought this to store a tens unit I recently acquired that came with a pretty flimsy bag with a string tie. This is much better. It is a durable fabric covered rubber case, with a label on the exterior, a net bag interior and a number of elastic straps to store your gear in safety and in comfort. It is also not too big so you don't have to worry about taking too much space in your luggage if you want to travel with it. The case has a zipper and a clip for ease of use. It is black and orange.The only thing I didn't like was that it somewhat smelly. Especially when you open it, it has a strong scent of rubber which I didn't care for being chemically sensitive to artificial/chemical smells this is a negative. It could've been gassed off more before shipment.

I have purchased polyester shower curtains before which do not require liners, and I was a bit surprised that this is so sheer and more like a net than anything I would hang in the shower. This curtain is a nice metallic gray silver color with tiny square lattice 'windows' in the weave. As someone who is trying to reduce the presence of harmful plastics from things such as shower curtain liners, it would be pretty impossible to use this without a liner unless you are extremely careful with your showering. It does look nice, and has a masculine quality for lace which might appeal to some.This might make a nice window treatment thought, or if you wanted to use the curtain over a bookcase.

Sketchers discontinued these on their website in favor of flimsy shoes with memory foam inserts. Since I wear an orthotic, I remove sketchers inserts to put my own in, so memory foam doesn't entice me. These shoes are firm, solidly built and look snazzy. I may buy a few more pairs to stock up on.

I have used a couple of FM Transmitters in order to play music from my phone in my car.  I have an older car that doesn't have Bluetooth and using an FM transmitter allows me to utilize my car stereo with my iPhone.  I do prefer this type of FM Transmitter versus the ones that are one unit that plug into the cigarette plug.This FM transmitter is all one piece with an optional included mount.  On one end of the FM transmitter is a 3.5mm cable that you plug into the headphone jack on the phone or iPod and on the other end is the cigarette plug charger. One the cigarette charger is a spare 2.4A USB port which comes in handy for keeping my phone charged. Setting up the scanner is easy.  The transmitter auto scans to find the best station to play music from. Synch up the FM station on the stereo with the FM Station on the transmitter and that's it.The FM transmitter has enough stations to choose from to ensure that interference does not occur. I have had previous experiences with FM transmitters that sometimes there is a buzzing sound on the speakers. Do not notice the same issue with this transmitter. This FM transmitter is also able to provide hands-free conversations via the car speakers which works great.Overall, great FM transmitter. The sound quality is great, easy to use, no interference as well as the ability for hands-free calling. I was provided a sample for review purposes.

The OxyLed UV Flashlight is similar works as advertised. The UV light has 12 LEDs and is powered by 3 AAA batteries, which are included.  The UV light is easy to operate and is turned on and off by the button on the bottom of the flashlight.  It is easy to hold the flashlight in one hand and press the flashlight on and off at the same time with the same hand.  The UV flashlight also has a languard to put around your wrist.Some uses of UV flashlights are: Pet Urine stains Rodent contamination Help detect bed bugs Hunt scorpions Detecting leaks with UV dyes Finding certain minerals Detecting counterfeit currency and productsI can attest that using this in my bathroom it does pickup urine stains very well.  I have two dogs as well and I found that they have pee'd in places I wasn't aware of.  The UV light works best when the lights are off. The light emits a purple hue which is easier to see in darkness.  This light is brighter than others I've tried and has a very fairly focused output, this makes a big difference.I was provided a sample unit for my honest and unbiased review.

I got the USpicy Makeup Brushes 8 Pieces Make Up Brushes and am quite pleased with the quailty.  It is a 8 peice makeup brush set with an included carrying pouch.  The carrying pouch makes it a great option for traveling.  The carrying pouch has a leather look to it but it is actually made of plastic.  There is an internal compartment to hold each brush individually and a button to keep the case securely closed.  All the essential brushes are included: Loose Powder Brush, blush brush, angled definer brush, blending brush, eye shadow brush, eyeliner brush, eyebrow brush and a lip brush.  The brush set is also available with a brown wooden handle or a white wooden handle on amazon.  The quality of the handles and bristles are great. No difference in quality that I can tell from the single pack brushes that you can get in retail stores. It is great for giving as a present or as a replacement for older brushes. The bristles are made of both synthetic fibers and natural hair depending on the brush.  They also don't have a problem with shedding which is great even after washing.  The bristles retain their softness and stay gentle on the skin even after washing.These compare well with more expensive brand name brushes such as Sigma and MAC and are way better then drugstore brushes as well as cheaper. Really can't beat the quality. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a new brush set. I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

I got the USpicy Makeup Brushes 8 Pieces Make Up Brushes and am quite pleased with the quailty.  It is a 8 peice makeup brush set with an included carrying pouch.  The carrying pouch makes it a great option for traveling.  The carrying pouch has a leather look to it but it is actually made of plastic.  There is an internal compartment to hold each brush individually and a button to keep the case securely closed.  All the essential brushes are included: Loose Powder Brush, blush brush, angled definer brush, blending brush, eye shadow brush, eyeliner brush, eyebrow brush and a lip brush.  The brush set is also available with a brown wooden handle or a white wooden handle on amazon.  The quality of the handles and bristles are great. No difference in quality that I can tell from the single pack brushes that you can get in retail stores. It is great for giving as a present or as a replacement for older brushes. The bristles are made of both synthetic fibers and natural hair depending on the brush.  They also don't have a problem with shedding which is great even after washing.  The bristles retain their softness and stay gentle on the skin even after washing.These compare well with more expensive brand name brushes such as Sigma and MAC and are way better then drugstore brushes as well as cheaper. Really can't beat the quality. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a new brush set. I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

I have two Shihtzu's and if they don't have their hair combed it can get knotted especially after baths.  Not to mention they tend to like being combed.  This is the first two in one brush that I have tried and I do prefer it.  It's one less brush that I have to look for and one less brush I have to store.  The brush has a head that is also flexible so it isn't so stiff against the dogs body when brushing him.  I do prefer the brush over the comb for my Shihtzu but I do use the comb for the ears and tails.  Both the brush and comb do a good job of holding onto the hair until it is ready to be removed and thrown away. The grips on both items are good as well and feel comfortable in the hand.  Both items look to be well made have been holding up well so far. Overall, this a great set of grooming tools that is gentle enough on the pets yet still functional.  I was provided a sample in exchange for an honest and thorough review.

The Bluetooth 2-in-1 Adapter, TaoTronics Wireless Audio Transmitter/Receiver Dongle is great for adding Bluetooth capability to a home stereo system.  I have my music library on my iPhone but prefer listening to music on my home stereo system.  The Bluetooth adapter allows for that.  It's straightforward and easy to setup, just plug the 3.5mm cable into the input on the stereo and pair the dongle to your phone and that's it.  This dongle is actually both a transmitter and receiver which is great to have the option. Although I am only using the receiver option of it for my home stereo.  Switching from transmitter to receiver is done by just flipping a switch.  The dongle has a builtin battery that lasts roughly 8 hours as well as being able to run while plugged into AC power.  Sound quality from my iPhone to stereo system is great and the range of the Bluetooth 33 feet.  Overall this is a great device to give a non-Bluetooth device Bluetooth capability.I was provided a sample product for review.

This is a review for the Aerb Pro Selife Stick.  What I like most about this selfie stick is that it has a standard 1/4in mount connector, similar to the ones on tripods.  This makes the selfie stick compatible with digital cameras as well as GoPro's. This is not a feature that I have found on many selfie sticks, the typical selfie stick just has the abilty to hold a cell phone and that's it.  This unique feature makes this selfie stick a buy for me over other ones.The selfie stick works by connecting via Bluetooth.  This is a Bluetooth Selfie Stick and pairing is straightforward and easy. No issues were encountered pairing the stick with my iPhone 5s. The operation button is perfectly placed on the end of the handle. This button is used to power on the stick, pair the stick as well as take the picture. At the bottom of the stick is the micro USB charging port.  Since the Bluetooth wouldn't be compatible with a digital camera I have found that using the timer setting works just as well.The selife stick extends out from 32cm to 98cm.  Extending and retracting the selfie stick is smooth.  I have found that some selfie sticks  take a lot of elbow grease to extend and retract.  The selife stick does not feel flimsy at all when full extending and is lightweight enough to easily operate in one hand. There is a U shaped clamp at the end of the stick that is used for gripping a phone. The top and bottom of the clamp has a rubber cushion to keep the phone secure and from getting damaged. An iphone 5s fits perfectly within the arms of the holder. The selfie stick also has a built-in 80 mAH rechargeable battery that lasts roughly 40 hours in operation and 100 hours on standby.  The battery life is typical for selfie sticks.Overall, I am quick pleased with this selfie stick. It works great, easy to use, compact enough to easily carry in a purse or bag and love that it has a tripod mount for use with GoPro's and digital cameras.  I was provided a sample product for testing purposes.

I just got the Anker [5-Pack] PowerLine Micro USB cables for review purposes.  This is a nice set of cables that comes with two 1ft, two 3ft and one 6ft cables.  I love the 1 foot cables for charging my devices with a portable power bank.  The 3 feet and 6 feet cables are great for connecting devices to cables or charging devices from wall adapter.  Now for the cables themselves they are premium quality.  Not like the cheap aftermarket OEM cables where the tip ends up breaking off or the cable sheath ends up getting torn when run over by a chair.  This set of Anker cables has Kevlar reinforcement, made of thicker gauge wires and has been stress tested up to 10,000 bends.  The 10,000 bend stress testing is important as this is a typical weak point of a cable.  I have used these cables with my Samsung S5 and didn't run into any issues with compatibility.  I have used both the 1 ft with a power bank and the 3ft to connect the phone to my computer.  Overall, these are a quality set of durable cables that should last quite some time.

This review is for the Huawei 10W 5V/2A Traveler Wall Charger.  I feel that this charger is better for home / office use than as a travel charger.  For travel chargers I prefer multiple USB ports as well as foldable plugs. Also this charger has the capability for trickle charging which is great for office use and keeping the phone fully charged.  The charger itself is well constructed and seems very durable.  It is made of plastic.  The USB port on the charger is capable of outputting up to 2A which is good enough for recharging a cell phone.  The USB port is snug and no issues of loose connections.  The charger is also dual voltage being able to support both 110v and 240v, which does make it great for worldwide use.  The charger dimensions is: 2.8 in x 2 in x 0.9 in and the weight comes in at roughly 1.6 oz.  I tested this charger with my iPhone 4s as well as utilizing it to recharge my USB speaker.  Both applications worked great.  Overall, this is a great charger from a well known company.  I was provided a sample item for review purposes.

The Huawei AM08 Bluetooth speaker is such a cool looking device.  It has a futuristic modern high end look to it.  It has some very cool features to it such as touch control button and light notification.  For instance when a call comes in a red light constantly flashes for visual notification.  Pairing the device is straightforward and the speaker can also be paired to two devices at the same time. Bluetooth operation is roughly 10 meters, which isn't the longest distance but is manageable.  There is a built-in rechargeable lithium battery that lasts roughly 5 to 6 hours and is fully recharged in 3 hours.  The speaker can also be used which it is plugged into a power source.  Sound of the speaker is great for its size.  The highs are clear as well as the mid-ranges.  Bass is somewhat lacking but this is a roughly 2 watt speaker so that is understandable, as well as being meant for phone use as well as music.  Overall, sound is well balanced for both listing to music and for phone calls.Overall, I love the design of this speaker and features. It is comes nicely package and would be great as a gift.  The touch operation of the speaker paired with the lighting effects is a great aspect of it. I was provided a sample item for review purposes.

I got the Aukey Quick Charge 2.0 10000mAh Portable External Battery. The power bank slim and sleek looking. There are two USB ports and the device is able to charge two devices simultaneously. The battery pack came with one USB cable as well to charge the device, no wall charger is included. The device is working great thus far. Charging times on the power bank are a little better that when using a wall charger to charge my iPhone 4s. The power bank can also be used to charge devices when you are charging the power bank, which is a nice.Standout Features:- I love that the battery level indicator is the logo Aukey Logo itself. If the logo is Red that there is 0% to 20% battery left, Grey 20% to 60% and white 60% to fully charged.- The turbo recharge feature is another great feature. Since this is a 10,000 mAh battery pack recharge times can take 6 to 8 hours typically and sometimes more. Being able to fully recharge in 4 to 5 hours is surprising.- The Qualcomm certified Quick Charge 2.0 is a great feature for those who have compatible devices. iPhones sadly aren't one of them so this is not a feature I could take advantage of. What this feature allows though is faster charging time for those compatible devices- Sony battery cells. I like that the Aukey is disclosing the type of cells used. Sony is a brand that I trust when it comes to electronics. We have all heard the stories of off-brand batteries overheating and causing injury.- Built-in LED flashlightTo give a rough idea of the amount of times you would be able to fully recharge your devices battery here is a list of device battery capacities:* iPhone 4 Battery (1420 mAh)  6 to 7 recharges* iPhone 4S Battery (1432 mAh)  5 to 6 recharges* iPhone 5 Battery (1434 mAH)  6 to 7 recharges* iPad 2 Battery (6944 mAh)  1 and a half recharges* iPad 3 Battery (11560 mAh)  close to one full recharge* iPad 4 Battery (11486 mAH)  close to one full recharge* iPad Mini Battery (4490 mAH)  1  to 2 recharges* Kindle Fire Battery (4400 mAh)  1  to 2 rechargesOverall, this is still an excellent battery pack. Operation of the battery pack is excellent and works as advertised therefore I recommend this product. I received a retail unit of this battery pack for a fair and honest review.

This has to be one of the most attractive difussers I have come accross yet.  I love the all white look to it.  It reminds me of a porcelian ceramic vase although it is made of plastic.  The diffuser is able to hold up to 500 ml of water and has an auto shut off feature if no more water is left.  The diffuser can pretty much last the whole day on the low mist mode, 16 hours to be specific. In high mist mode it lasts up to 8 hours.  The diffuser has multiple settings as well: low or high mist, timer to include 1, 3 or 6 hours, continous mode, as well as 7 color LED option.  One thing worth mentioning is also how super quiet the diffuser is when operating.This is an electric diffuser so it does require an outlet.  Although since it is electric it is safer then open flame diffusers as well as cheaper.  You can use one estential oil or mix them up for the scent that you wish.  There are recipes online for for different estential oil mixtures and associated health benefits.  The diffuser does a great job of adding aroma to a room.  With the high or low mist setting it is easy to get the mist flow that suits the room best.Overal, the diffuser looks and works great.  I have nothing negative to say about it. I was provided a sample unit for my honest and unbiased review.

For protecting your cell phone screen there are really two options tempered glass screen protectors like this one or PET (plastic) screen protectors.  In my opinion PET screen protectors are good for preventing the screen from getting scratched up or preventing glare, etc.  Tempered glass screen protectors are good for both keeping your screen from getting scratched up and from breakage.  Tempered glass screen protectors are like adding another layer of glass to your phone, somewhat like double windows.  There is a price difference between tempered glass and PET screen protectors though but to me tempered glass is more than worth it.  It is a lot easier to replace a screen protector than it is to replace the actual phone screen.I have tried other Aukey products and they are a great brand and make quality products.  This screen protector from Aukey is lower priced than competitors but the quality is just as great.  Included are the tempered glass screen protector, alcohol wipe, two home button stickers and micro fiber cloth.  This is pretty much typical for screen protectors.  The home button stickers are optional to use.  They are included as tempered glass screen protectors are thicker than PET screen protectors and have more of a raised surface. One issue that can occur with tempered glass screen protectors is a loss of responsiveness.  I was happy to find that with this screen protector, responsiveness was not affected.  This protector also doesn't have much of an issue with smudges.  Installing is pretty straightforward and takes only minutes.  Installing in a steamy bathroom does help with the dust issue as the steam helps weigh down the dust in the air.Overall this is a great quality tempered glass screen protector.  The cost is really attractive and installation is a breeze.  Great economical way to protect the iPhone screen. I was provided a sample unit for my honest and unbiased review.

The Moonmini Vibrance Series iPhone 6S Case is perfect.  It is a slim protective case that doesn't add bulk to the iPhone. It is available in multiple colors.  I ended up getting the cherry pink and champagne gold case and I'm in love with the colors.  The cherry pink looks great and the champagne gold helps highlight the pink.  The case has a soft rubber inner backing so that it doesn't scratch up the back of your phone as well.  The cut outs are perfectly matched up and I love that it's just not a circular or square cutout.  It gives the case a unique attractive look.  The outer case itself is made of hard plastic giving the phone a shell to protect against scratches and drops.  The case is super thin and lightweight while still providing great protection.Overall, the case is great and a really affordable way to keep the iPhone looking new. I was provided a sample unit for my honest and unbiased review.

I got the Eva Medical Pedal Exerciser for review purposes and have used it a couple of times already.  The mini bike is one solid piece so no assembly is required.  The bike has a chrome finish and is steel frame. There are four rubber feet to keep it from moving as well as a plastic pedals and straps.  I have been using this with socks only and it is comfortable enough on the feet to do so.  There is a tension knob on the top of the mini bike.  You are not going to get the same amount of tension as on the exercise bikes though.  The mini bike is more comparable to pedaling on a flat open road. I have been using this when reclining back in my chair watching tv and it has been working great.  One thing I ended up noticing is that the metal arm for the pedal can get hot after a while of pedaling.  I am not sure if this is typical of the mini bikes as this one is the first I have tried but I think it is due to having the tension knob as tight as it could go and pedaling for a while.Overall, the mini peddler works as it should.  It's easy to use and ready to use right when it arrives. I picked this off of a list of things needing a review at a discounted rate or free and gave my unbiased honest opinion.

The Codream Micro Perforated Stainless Steel Colander 5 Quart is quite a step up from the mesh strainer I currently have.  I actually needed a new strainer as the current one I have, the plastic rim cracked.  This one is 10 times better in quality, design and function.  I love that it is made of all stainless steel and no plastic at all.  I also love that it has a bottom foot to help with draining water when having it placed down.  Instead of having to place the strainer in the pan I can place the strainer directly in the sink.  I was actually watching a cooking show on the Food Network and was surprised to see a colander same in design to this one.  If this type colander design is good enough for a cooking show it's good enough for me.I do like that there are drainage holes from the top of the bottom of the Colander, not only does this help with water escaping faster but air drying as well. The holes are also small enough to keep food from falling out but not to where it hampers drainage.Overall, I am happy with this colander.  It is durable, works great and has a professional kitchen look to it.  I expect it to last a long time and it will be getting a lot of use.  I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

This is the first time I have tried a folding bucket.  I actually didn't know they even existed, but what a cool idea.  A bucket that is easy to store, lightweight and compact.  The bucket comes with a zippered storage bag which isn't required but is a plus to keep things neat.  The bucket is made of waterproof fabric and is great for a multitude of applications such as RVing, camping, the beach and even fishing.  The bucket can be used to transport liquids such as water or to keep drinks cold. Included with the bucket is a small removable handle.  Since the bucket is foldable and made of fabric it can collapse at times when placed on a surface.  This doesn't happen often but the possibility is still there.  I have found that either filling the bucket fully or just inserting a couple of wooden stir sticks keeps this from happening, this is more of a precaution then anything else.  So far the bucket has been working great.  I have used it to keep water in and wash the car as well as have ice in to keep drinks cold on the beach.  I have been leaving it in the car and it takes up barely any space which is great.  It is small enough to fit into the side compartment.  The bucket also tends to dry quickly so no issues with keeping it out to air dry overnight.  Overall the bucket is well constructed and is really convenient. If I wasn't provided this for sample review purposes I most likely would have purchased it when I came  across it.  I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

This is a review for the TaoTronics Globe String Lights model TT-SL205.  There are 25 Clear G40 5W light bulbs that are 26 feet long.  The nice thing about this product is that the lights are extendable up to 3 more sting of lights.  Another thing is if one bulb goes bad the string of lights still works.  One spare replacement bulb is also included.  The lights use a standard C7/E12 socket and can be replaced with other lights as well, colored or clear bulbs.  One thing to keep in mind is that the power cord does not have a long leed before the bulb starts on the line, there is about 6 inches between the bulb and plug, same on both ends. Between each bulb there is 1 foot of spacing.The string of lights is great for a number of applications.  I have mine strung around my porch railing and it looks great.  The lights are bright enough but not blinding.  There does look to be a fuse in the plug, although I did not remove it to verify.Overall, the bulbs work great.  They are competitively priced and easy to install and use.  No issues here.  I was provided this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest unbiased evaluation.

I got the EasyAcc Metal 10000mAh External Battery Pack Portable Power Bank - Gray.  The power bank is of the slim design, long yet thin.  There are two USB ports, one dedicated 1 Amp in Black and one dedicated 2.1A in Blue.  The different colors makes it easier to differiate the ports from each other.  Next two the two USB ports is 5 LEDs to indicate battery live.  The battery pack came with one USB cable as well to charge the device, no wall charger is included. The device is working great thus far.  The look of it reminds me of the newer Western Digital portable hard drives.  Charging times on the power bank are comparable when using a wall charger to charge my iPhone 4s.  Both USB ports can be used simultaniously as well.  The power bank can also be used to charge devices when you are charing the power bank yourself.Specifications:Capacity: 10,000 mAh x 3.7V = 37 WhBattery Type: Li-polymer Rechargeable CellOutput: Port 1 - DC 5V 1A  Port 2 - DC 5V 2.1AInput: DC 5V 2AWeight: 9.1 ouncesTo give a rough idea of the amount of times you would be able to fully recharge your devices battery here is a list of device battery capacities:* iPhone 4 Battery (1420 mAh)  6 to 7 recharges* iPhone 4S Battery (1432 mAh)  5 to 6 recharges* iPhone 5 Battery (1434 mAH)  6 to 7 recharges* iPad 2 Battery (6944 mAh)  1 and a half recharges* iPad 3 Battery (11560 mAh)  close to one full recharge* iPad 4 Battery (11486 mAH)  close to one full recharge* iPad Mini Battery (4490 mAH)  1  to 2 recharges* Kindle Fire Battery (4400 mAh)  1  to 2 rechargesOverall, this is still an excellent battery pack. The design aspects and performance are great. The 20 dollar price cannot be beat and is really competitive for a 10000 mAh battery pack. Operation of the battery pack is excellent and works as advertised therefore I recommend this product.I received a retail unit of this battery pack for a fair and honest review.

The TaoTronics Pet UV Urine Detector Flashlight model TT-FL002 is great. It is well made and heavy duty. This model is Taotronics second versus of the UV flashlight, I have the first version as well and have added a picture for side by side comparision. It is similar to the TaoTronics Tactical flashlight with the same aluminum body but with 51 UV LEDs. The UV light is powered by 3 AA batteries, which are 3 Duracell batteries are included. The UV light is easy to operate. It is turned on and off by the rubber button on the side of the flashlight. The UV flashlight also comes with a languard.When I looked up the uses for UV lights I saw some applications that I wasnt aware of. Some uses are: Pet Urine stains Rodent contamination Help detect bed bugs Hunt scorpions Detecting leaks with UV dyes Finding certain minerals Detecting counterfeit currency and productsI myself tried this out to look for urine stains from our two dogs, which it did find. It is easier to detect with the UV light with the lights off. The light emits a purple hue which is easier to see in darkness. I also tried this looking at US money and did see some things with the UV light that I never knew were there and that werent as easily visible with the naked eye.Overall, this is great to have. It is extremely portable and easy to carry around in a pocket. The 51 LEDs does make a difference in making things easier to see. If you have indoor pets I would highly suggest getting this as pets tend to go in the same spot specially if not cleaned up properly.I was provided a sample unit for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a review for the Retractable Dog Leash by TaoTronics.  I has a 16ft length with dimensions of 6.1in x 4.25in x 1.38in.  It is rated for dogs up to 110 lbs.  This retractable dog leash is pretty heavy duty and does have some weight to it. It is constructed of ABS plastic and seems to be pretty durable.  The handle has a rubber coating to aid in gripping and comfortability.  The lead on the leash is made of nylon fabric and seems pretty durable.The leash retracts automatically picking up the slack or giving slack smoothly. There is a brake button at the top of the handle that will keep the leash at the current length as well.  The brake button is easily operated with the thumb. The brake can be set in the permeant lock setting or pressed for temporary lock.  I put the lock in permanent lock and pulled on the lead and it didn't budge. The leash is easy to operate with one hand and has an extra wide handle for a comfortable grip.When comparing a retractable tape leash like this one versus a retractable rope leash, the tape leash wins no hands down. Tape leashes are far more superior and safer while as retractable rope leash is thinner making it harder to see. If the rope leash gets wrapped around you or the dog it also has the potential for causing injury. Tape leashes while not only safer are also easier to manage in that they have less of a tendency to get tangled or knotted. Also for any tape of retractable leash it is safer for the dog to have it connected to a harness versus a collar. With retractable leashes if the dog runs and comes to the end of the length or if the brake is suddenly applied then the dog can be abruptly pulled back.Overall this is a great leash. I have used Flexi retractable leashes in the past both rope and tape versions and I can say that this one compares nicely. A nice addition to this leash is that it comes with a light that can be attached to the dogs collar.  I was provided a sample product for review purposes and I am a dog owner.

I got this case for the Samsung Galaxy Note 2 and it is just gorgeous.  The case comes in a clear plastic wrap with foam on the inside for the case to keep it's shape.  The case is made of faux white leather with slots on the inside flap for storing credit cards or folded up bills.  The inside of the case is brown and the material looks to be leather but may also be faux leather as well.  There is also an included black wristlet that can be attached to the side top eye hole. The design aspects of the front of the case look to be glued on and include the word Love, the Eifel Tower, two butterflies, three square rhinestones as well as smaller round rhinestones on the front. I haven't had issues yet with any of the pieces falling off.  The latch on this case is also magnetic, which helps in keeping the cover securely closed and keeping items in the inside slots protected. The case is lightweight yet still offering great protection. The siding of the case is white silicone which goes well with the rest of the case. The silicone is soft and thick enough to provide adequate protection. The back of the phone also is protected by the same silicone material as on the sides. The silicone is not only for protection but for holding the phone in the case.Overall I am quite happy with this case. It is a great design and has been holding up very well.  I was provided the opportunity for a free sample for review purposes.

I got this case for the Samsung Galaxy Note 2.  The case comes in a clear plastic wrap with foam on the inside for the case to keep it's shape.  The details on the case are just superb and the design perfect. The case is made of faux white leather with slots on the inside flap for storing credit cards or folded up bills. There is also an included wristlet that can be attached to the side top eye hole. The design aspects of the front of the case look to be glued on and I haven't had issues yet with any of the pieces falling off.  The latch on this case is also magnetic, which helps in keeping the cover securely closed and keeping items in the inside slots protected.The case is also really lightweight yet still offering great protection. The siding of the case is white silicone which goes well with the rest of the case. The silicone is soft and thick enough to provide adequate protection from drops and dings. The back of the phone also is protected by the same silicone material as on the sides. The silicone is not only for protection but for holding the phone in the case, in essence hugging the phone and keeping it securely in the case.Overall I am quite happy with this case. I just love the design of it. It is a simple design yet romantic and elegant at the same time. Great case and really great price as well. I was provided the opportunity for a free sample for review purposes.

This is a review for the Moonmini FreeCall LC-B41 Bluetooth 4.0 Headset. This headset has the longest battery running time that I have come across on a Bluetooth headset coming in at 24 hours.  No worries about the headset dying in the middle of the day. The headset also is able to display the battery level on Apple IOS phones, this is a feature that I love.  The headset also has voice support meaning that it will respond to voice commands.  The headset is available  in black, white and gold.  I got the gold one and love the color.  Typically I see headsets in black only so the choice of color is refreshing.I really like how it's light weight and fits perfect on my ear and doesn't kill it after wearing for a while. The headset is comfortable and extremely lightweight.  It doesn't make my ear sore at all and the the sound quality is great.  I have had issues in the past where a headset made my ear sore which means it doesn't get used. The headset has a nice modern look to it and is easy to use. Pairing with the iPhone 4s is easy and takes under a minute. It has the typical functions that most headsets come with and is priced relatively reasonably. Overall the headset has been working great and I don't have any complaints.Specifications:Bluetooth Version: 4.0Talk time: Approx 24 hrsStandby time: Approx 40 daysCharging time: Approx 3 hrsMusic Play time: Approx 22 hrsRange: 10 metersPairing: up to 2 DevicesIncluded: Bluetooth Headset, USB Cable and two ear clipsI was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return.

I got the USpicy Makeup Brushes 32 Pieces Set - Black and I must say when I first opened the package I was estatic.  This is a great set of brushes for both a starter and professional.  Each brush is roughly less than 50 cents each which is a steal.  The quality of the handles and bristles are great as well.  No difference in quality that I can tell from the single pack brushes that you can get in retail stores.  This brush set actually has more brushes then I am use to.  Some brush types I have actually never used before but am happy to try out.  It is great for giving as a present or as a replacement for older brushes.  These are my favorite brushes to use now and I love that it comes with a storage case.- Brushes are synthetic which makes them great for people with allergic tendencies towards natural hair brushes- Very minimal shedding, really only when washing the brushes for the first time- Brushes are very pretty and look like professional brushes- Included is a brush for just about every purpose that you could think of- Not heavy in the hand and not to light to where they feel cheap- Blending of makeup is smooth- Bristles are really soft and gentle on the skin even after washing- Work great with both powder and liquid makeupThese compare well with more expensive brand name brushes such as Sigma and MAC and are way better then drugstore brushes as well as cheaper.
