Really can't beat the quality for the price.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a new brush set. I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

I have been using LED light bulbs for quite some time now but this is the first time trying them from an amazon supplier.  The quality and performance of the TaoTronics LED Bulbs is just as good as the Sylvania or Utilitech brand bulbs from the big department stores such as Home Depot and Lowes.  I do prefer LED bulbs over incandescent bulbs, I feel that they save on electricity, last longer as well as work just as well.This is a six pack of Taotronics LED bulbs 9W.  The bulbs come in a box and are individually boxed within the larger box.  Per the instructions the bulbs are designed for indoor use and are not waterproof nor recommended in high moisture locations.  The bulbs are also covered by a 12 month warranty from defects from TaoTronics.  The bulbs are a replacement for 60W incandescent bulbs, thus brightness level is comparable.Technical Specifics:Model: TT-LB01Voltage: AC 120 60HzPower: 9WColor Temperature: 3000K (warm)Lumens: 810 lumensLifespan: 25000hThe light output from these are a soft white with a hint of yellow.  The bulbs work great, don't make any noise and don't take an time to warm up.  Not to mention they are also mercury free.  Overall these are a great set of LED lights at a great price with no complaints to speak of. As a disclosure, I was provided a sample product for testing and review purposes.

I have high hopes for the Anker PowerLine Micro USB (1ft) cable.  I think I have gone through it all with OEM and aftermarket cables.  End connectors breaking off in my devices charging point, the cable sleeve getting torn, the end connector separating from the cable itself as well as cables dropping connectivity by the slightest touch.This cable from Anker features the following:-Reinforced with Kevlar fiber-10,000 bend lifespan-Hard PVC reinforcement to ensure connector doesn't break-Compact connectors to ensure case compatibilityWhen picking up the cable you can definitely feel the difference in construction.  It feels to be constructed of higher quality material.  I have a feeling that this cable will be able to stand up to being left in the car with blazing temperatures as well as being rolled over or stepped on.  I actually feel that it is better than the OEM cables that came with my device.  I tested this out with my phone and powerbank and no issues with charging.  The connectors fit snugly in the charging ports and the end connector is easy to grip to remove.Overall, the cable has been working out great.  It shouldn't be to hard to make a quality cable but for some reason it is.  I feel confident in this cable from Anker and have no reservations on recommending it to anyone.  This was provided as a sample product for testing purposes and has not at all swayed my opinion.

This is a review for the TaoTronics Portable Multi-angle Tablet/Smartphone Stand. This device is similar to a stand that I have for my books, something I tend to use pretty often as well as some stands that come with some cases. I actually had a similar stand on my Otterbox case for my iPad, and I went with that case just because of the stand. Although the hinge ended up snapping, plus the case was bulky and heavy. This type of standalone stand is so better, as it is more lightweight, can be used with multiple devices and compact as well.The stand is made of aluminum with rubber padding to keep the device from getting scratched. The case is small enough to be easily portable and is pretty lightweight. The stand has multiple viewing options, 11 different angles to be exact and can support devices in both vertical and horizontal positions. Not to mention the case is compatible with multiple manufacturer devices. So if you have a kindle, iPad, Samsung Tab you should have no issues. Although I tried this with only my iPad and Samsung Tab so can only speak to those two devices, but it worked perfectly. The stand works great for making videos with my Samsung Tab. To change the viewing angle of the stand all is needed it to press the button on the side of the stand. The stand also has a circular cut out to run cables through.Overall, I rate this stand 5 stars as it does fit a need and works as it should as well as being super convenient. I was provided a product for an honest and unbiased review.

This is a great grow light for indoor plants.  I actually have the first Taotronics grow light which this one is a newer improved model.  The difference between the two is this one is 12 LEDs at 2W versus the original version 12 LEDs at 1w.The light is quality made and the same design as the original grow light.  The original grow light from Taotronics is still available from Amazon and is cheaper if you are good with 1W LEDs. The light does not get overly hot nor does it put off a lot of heat. The lamp itself and bulb are surprisingly cool to the touch, no worries about this bulb cooking the plants.  The light has a ribbed design on the sides that aid in keeping the bulb cool.  The bulb has 12 LEDs (3 blue & 9 red). The bulb is constructed of both plastic and metal and does have some weight to it.Past experience with the original bulb was great and did wonders for my plants.  I am expecting the same or better results from this bulb.Overall, I am quite impressed with the grow lights from Taotronics.  They work great and can be up in running in seconds.  A discount code was provided to me to purchase this grow light for review purposes.

This is a review for the CMS 500DL Generation 2 Fingertip Pulse Oximeter Oximetry Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitor.  This is the first time I have tried something like this and it is just great.  I have tried the blood pressure machines in the supermarket probably like everyone else but this is 100% better and comfortable.  It comes with the CMS 500DL itself, silicon cover, batteries and a lanyard.  The silicon cover and lanyard are optional and aren't required for the device to work.  The CMS 500DL is easy to use and works great.  Great for quick and easy spot checking at the comfort of home.  The display is easy to read and the unit operation straightforward.  The device is lightweight, compact and available in different colors as well.  Overall great item that doesn't break the bank.  I was supplied a discount code to purchase a sample review product for test and evaluation purposes.

I have always wanted to try these type of lenses out to see how well they work.  I tend to have my phone with me all the time which makes it convenient to take pictures with. Overall, I am quite pleased with these lenses thus far.  They give different options for taking pictures, are small enough to have in your pocket as well as easy enough to use.  Still waiting to see how durable they end up being.The lenses are great quality.  Picture quality is crisp and clean.  They come with three different lenses (fish-eye lens, macro lens and wide angle lens), two clips for holding the lenses as well as a microfiber cleaning cloth.  The clips are constructed so that they are able to fit on different phones whether it be a Samsung or Apple model.  I tried this on my Samsung Tab and my iPhone 4s and both instances worked great.  My favorite lenses of the pack are the macro and wide angle.  I might not even bother with carrying around the fish-eye lenses with me. In order to use the macro lens you have to unscrew it from the wide angle lens (they come screwed together).  In order to use the wide angle lens the macro lens and the wide angle lens are combined.The lens package is great the only downside is that it doesn't come with a carrying case.  To keep the lenses clean from dust, dirt and fingerprints as well as to keep them protected a carrying case would be nice.  Also if your camera has flash using the lenses may cover the flash, just something to keep in mind.Overall, the lenses are great and give additional options for using your phone for photography.  I was provided a code for a discounted purchase price for review purposes.

The USpicy Sleep Mask with Ear Buds and Travel Pouch is great.  If you have trouble sleeping when it is not pitch dark then this is the solution.  Typically I dont like eye masks due to the fact that the ones I have tried are flat against my eyes and not comfortable.  This from USpicy is designed differently in that there are eye contours in which you can open or blink your eyes and not feel the mask.  It provides for a more comfortable feeling on the face and I was pleasantly surprised when I had it on.  The eye mask does a great job of blocking out the light.  When I had it on I didnt notice any light coming though, it was pitch black.  There is a Velcro strap head band that goes around your head to keep the mask in place.  Even the head band isnt that much noticeable.  The material of the eye mask is great; it is super soft to the touch. The eye mask comes with a carrying pouch to help keep it clean as well as ear plugs with their own plastic storage.  You really have to try on the eye mask to appreciate it.  Overall the mask is simply great and I am really happy with it.  Ill be surely bringing this with when traveling on airplanes to help with falling asleep easier.  Highly recommended!I was provided a sample product for review purposes.

The Anker Foldable Solar Panel is really unique and such a great device. It is a portable environmentally friendly source of power. Pair this device with a Portable Battery Packs and then you have the solar device to create power and the portable battery to store it until when you need it. I wish that someone would come out with a solar panel that had a built-in rechargeable battery. Of course you could always just plug your device directly into the built-in USB ports on the solar device but this only works in the daytime. The device has two: PowerIQ (Smart) USB ports that can charge a device up to 2.1A. No issues with pairing this with a iPhone 4s, Samsung Tab or portable battery pack.The device consists of two solar panels connected to two USB ports. The USB ports are enclosed in an attached pouch of which you can also use to put your device to charge so it stays secure. The pouch has a Velcro opening to keep things secure. The solar panel folds to the size of a small book making it easy to transport.- Perfectly designed for outdoor use  water and weather resistant nylon casing- Comes with hooks that can be used to hang or secure the solar panels to an object- Works without any issues or fuss and super easy to setup- Great for an emergency or survival kit- This is solar and solar isn't know for charging the fastest so I suggest pairing this with a battery pack. The solar panel recharging the battery pack and the battery pack charging your device.To me this is a must have device. Just for the single reason of it being solar would make it a purchase for me. If you have been in a blackout or had situations where you were remote with no power source than the usefulness of this device is easily understandable. I have other solar panels both three and two panel and this one performs just as well. The main difference is that this one has Anker's PowerIQ technology for the USB ports.I was provide a product for an honest and unbiased review.

This is a review for the Amzdeal Retractable Tape Dog Leash.  The leash has a retractable length up to 13ft and supports dogs up to 88 pounds.  Retractable dog leashes are great for giving your dog freedom to walk in areas you may not want to go.  The leash retracts automatically picking up the slack or giving slack.  There is a brake button at the top of the handle that will keep the leash at the current length as well.  The leash is easy to operate with one hand and has an extra wide handle for a comfortable grip.When comparing a retractable tape leash like this one versus a retractable rope leash, the tape leash wins no hands down.  Tape leashes are far more superior and safer while as retractable rope leash is thinner making it harder to see.  If the rope leash gets wrapped around you or the dog it also has the potential for causing injury.  Think of wrapping string around your figure and pulling it tight.  Tape leashes while not only safer are also easier to manage in that they have less of a tendency to get tangled or knotted.  Also for any tape of retractable leash it is safer for the dog to have it connected to a harness versus a collar.  With retractable leashes if the dog runs and comes to the end of the length or if the brake is suddenly applied then the dog can be abruptly pulled back.Overall this is a great leash.  I have used Flexi retractable leashes in the past both rope and tape versions and I can say that this one compares nicely.  One improvement I would add to the leash is putting reflective stitching the entire length of the tape, this will being seen when dark.I was provided a voucher code to purchase this item for review purposes. The review is my own and unbiased.

This is a review for the 75ft 200LED Amir Solar Powered LED String Light.  This device can be powered via both the included USB device or the included Solar Panel.  The USB device can be plugged into a wall charger, computer USB port and even a portal battery charger.  I tested powering it with both a RavPower portable battery charger and the solar panel and both instances would just as good.  The solar panel does have an internal 1800mAh Ni-MH battery.  When testing the light with the solar panel the brightness level of the LEDs was lower due to the internal batteries lack of current charge.I see application of the solar panel more towards if you want the lights to turn on and off automatically via the light sensor.  There is a on / off button at the back of the solar panel if you wish to turn the lights off for an extend period of time.  The solar panel can either be mounted on the wall or put in the ground via the included ground stake.  If mounted on the wall depending on the height it may prove harder to turn the lights on and off permanently.  The USB device to power the lights is a nice touch.  When using the USB device the lights would have to be turned on and off manually.  There are two settings: flash and steady lightning.  The design of the USB device to power the lights allows for the lights to be more portable if needed as well as being able to use the lights for a more extended period of time.There is enough wire between the solar panel / USB device and the first light to allow adequate space in-between both items.  Inside the connector plug is a rubber gasket to keep out water and a screw top cover to aid in further weatherproofing the connection.  Setup is straightforward and should only take a couple of minutes.  The time it will take to string the lights is a different story.Overall, this is a great product that comes with everything that would be needed for installation.  It is a great way to add low to no cost lighting to a porch, window, gazebo, etc.  I love solar products due to their low overall cost and environmental friendliness, this one is great and you will not be disappointed.  I was provided a voucher code to purchase this item for review purposes.  The review is my own and unbiased.

This is a review for the Amir Solar Spotlight with Wire.  The solar Spotlight can be used in two different applications, either mounted on the wall or staked in the ground.  The solar panel and light are two different pieces that have their own mounting brackets and ground stakes, this allows for better placement of the solar panel to get the most sunlight.  Mounting hardware for both applications is included.  The Solar Spotlight has two brightness levels with advertised runtime of 8 hours on high brightness and 14 hours on low brightness.  There is an on / off button on the back of the solar panel that is used to turn on / off the light and change the brightness level.  The solar panel has a light sensor so when it is detected that it is starting to get dark the light will activate.  The solar panel contains a replaceable 18650 3.7v 2200mAh rechargeable Ni-MH battery that is advertised to last at least 8 to 12 months possibly longer. After time rechargeable batteries start getting weaker so this lifetime estimate is not surprising.  There is also a connector to connect the solar panel and light wires together; inside the plug is a rubber gasket to keep out water and a screw top cover to aid in further weatherproofing the connection.  Installation is straightforward and should only take a couple of minutes.One thing I disliked didnt have anything to do with the solar light itself but with the packaging it came in.  The solar light is packaged in Styrofoam, when Styrofoam breaks into pieces it is a pain to clean up so I would rather avoid Styrofoam.Overall, this is a great product that comes with everything that would be needed for installation.  It is a great way to add low to no cost lighting to the yard or any other area.  I love solar products due to their low overall cost and environmental friendliness, this one is great and you will not be disappointed.  I was provided a voucher code to purchase this item for review purposes.  The review is my own and unbiased.

This is a review for the Amzdeal 7.7 inch Round Chrome-plated ABS Wall / Ceiling-mounted shower head.  For my application I am using this as a rain fall shower head as this is how my bathroom is currently setup.  The shower head is made of ABS plastic with a Crome finish which makes it lightweight for its size as well as giving it an elegant look.  My previous showerhead started showing rust spots so I wanted to have it replaced.  The face of the shower head is extra wide and outputs a wide stream of water.  The shower nubbins are soft flexible rubber tips that are flexible enough to clean out calcium or lime build-up yet stiff enough to keep the individual stream of water in the correct direction and flowing nicely.  Inside the screw joint there is a rubber gasket as well as a built-in strainer.  The connector is a G1/2 IPS connection which should fit standard plumbing connections.  Installation is a breeze and no tools are needed other than a chair or step ladder depending on how high this is getting installed.Overall, this is a great shower head that puts out a large volume of water while providing a gentle rain flow touch without sacrificing on water pressure.  The shower head has a beautiful classic high quality look to it and I couldnt be more pleased.  I purchased this item at a discounted rate for review purposes. The review is my own and unbiased.

The Aukey Sports Bluetooth 4.1 Headset, model EP-B13, are not the typically designed Bluetooth headsets. The ear hook on this headset is part of the earbud versus an attachable piece. The ear hook also helps in directing the direction of the wire behind the neck and relieving some of the weight off of the inner ear from the earbuds. The headset is also really lightweight and comes with 2 pair of different sized replaceable earbuds to help in getting a comfortable fit.The sound quality of the headsets is great. There is distortion at full volume but that can be expected. At normal volumes the sound is crisp and clean. The headset also has a built-in Mic for hands free calling that allows for clear communication with the other party. The headset has CVC noise cancellation technology which I believe helps in this regard. The headset is advertised as sweat-proof, only time will tell but so far this is proving to be true. The headset offers roughly 8 hours of active use and 160 hours of standby and roughly 2 hours to fully charge. A nice feature is that the battery level is also displayed on IOS devices, worked on my iPhone 4s.Overall, the headset works great and I am fond of the design of the headset. Sound quality is great, quality is great and the headset has a nice clean design.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

The Homdox BBQ Grill Brush is a really great heavy duty BBQ grill brush.  It is a really nice design that makes cleaning the grill much easier.  The brush bristles are made of stainless steel that do not bend out of shape as well as being able to get to all sides of the grate.  The bristles are still pointy and not matted down after rigorous use.  The design of the bristles allows for cleaning not only the top but the sides as well.  It is advertised as three brushes in one and it is quick to see why.  The three brush design makes cleaning the grill easier and faster due to the surface area the brush head and bristles are able to cover at once.  The handle and arm of the brush is tough and 18 inches long as well.  The length makes it easy to reach the back of the grate and if you clean the grill with the heat on, long enough to keep your hands from getting burnt.  The end of the handle also has a loop to make it easy for hanging while not in use.  I do prefer the black plastic handle versus wooden handles.  I find that the wooden handles end up getting dirty really quickly.Overall, this is a great sturdy BBQ grill brush and by far the best one I have used.  My old single head grill brush is now getting tossed and this one is replacing it.  Big improvement over the typical grill brushes. Highly recommend this brush based on quality, performance, and construction. Excellent product and would be great as a gift.  I received a sample of this product for review purposes.  All opinions stated are that of my own.

I have had a couple of USB wall chargers, some OEM that came with the device I purchased and some aftermarket purchases due to devices I purchased not having wall chargers included. From the various wall chargers that I have gone through I have learned that I like certain things included:1) Multiple ports, multiple port wall chargers allow the ability to charge more devices at once as well carry one less charger when traveling. Not to mention in an airport it means looking for one available outlet versus two or more.2) Enough amperage to at least charge two tablets at once. Enough amperage means the devices can charge at normal speeds.3) Smart featured ports, meaning the USB port is able to detect the correct amperage to output for your device. Now a days newer chargers have this feature. If the charger you are looking at doesnt have this feature move on to another one that does.4) Foldable wall plug, having a foldable plug is great for traveling and means easier packing and comfortability if it is in your pocket.5) CompactThe Anker PowerPort 4 (40W 4-Port USB Wall Charger) has everything I look for in a wall charger and more.  For one it is a 4 port wall charger versus two which makes it great for travel and for home use.  The wall charger is 40W which is enough to charge multiple tablets at full speed at the same time. But the notable difference with this wall charger compared to the many others I have gone through is that this one has Anker Voltage Boost technology, which means it can safely charge a device at faster speeds than normal, major plus for when charging my Samsung Tab and iPad. Not to mention it is also dual voltage, 110v/220v, a must for overseas travel.The wall charger is also compact, lightweight and has a foldable wall plug. Another nice thing about this wall charger is that it has smart USB ports meaning it can output 1A when an iPhone is plugged in or 2.4A when a Samsung Tab is plugged in regardless of which USB port. This wall charger also has LED lights but they arent overly bright and annoying.  Having bright LEDs is sometimes a distraction when trying to sleep if this is used in the bedroom.Overall, I am really happy with this wall charger. It works as advertised, has some value added features and is nicely priced.  I was supplied a sample product for review purposes, the review is my own.

This is a review for the Mpow Shark Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Headset Headphone. To me the most important things about a headset are comfortability and sound quality. The Mpow Shark passes with flying colors on both these aspects. Comfortability is important due to the number of hours that the device will be worn. If it makes the ear sore, is to heavy or just plain uncomfortable than it wont be used. Sound quality is just as important due to it being the main functionality that this device provides. The device itself has a nice modern look to it with a glossy black surface. The Shark comes with different sized ear hooks and earbuds which helps with the comfortability aspect and fit for the headset. This headset can also be paired with multiple phones which is great if you typically switch between multiple phones. Sound quality on both ends of the conversation was normal. I didnt have any issues hearing the other end nor them me. Operation of the headset is typical for Bluetooth headsets and it has the ability to change volume, play or pause, answer or end a call, re-dial and mute. Synching was just as straightforward and easy.Overall, I really like the look, design, comfort and sound quality is great. I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return. I was provided a sample product for testing purposes.

I love the features and design of TaoTronics TT-DL12 LED Desk Lamp. Its a modern stylish lamp, the type of lamp that I picture being on drafting tables. The lamp is constructed of aluminum and plastic.  Every part of the lamp that you would want to be adjustable is.  The lamp head rotates and both arms rotate as well.  The lamp is pretty heavy, due to the base.  It is designed this way in order to ensure that the lamp does not tip over due to the various options of positioning the lamp head.Since this is an LED lamp it has all the benefits that come with LED: less power, longer lasting and less eye strain.  Unlike other Taotronics lamps this one is not touch activated.  On the head of the lamp is an off / on switch.  The lamp is powered by a DC 12.5V/0.48A wall adapter that plugs into the cable at the base of the lamp.  The lamp is 6W and a temperature of 5500K, which makes it a cool white.  Since this is an LED lamp the lifespan of the bulbs are rated at 50,000 hours, meaning you will never have to replace them.Overall, this is a great lamp and nothing about it is disappointing. Its LED, has a great contemporary modern look to it and takes up minimal space.  This is great for a study table or college student.  I was supplied a sample product for review purposes, the review is my own.

This is a review for the Esky ES-PS01 110lb/50kg Backlit LCD Display Electronic Balance Scale.  The scale runs on 2 AAA batteries which are included.  It has a pull out tape measure that can be used to check the dimensions of a bag or box as well as a hook to hold an item in the air to get the weight.  The handled extends up and provides adequate room for a comfortable grip.  On the back of the scale is a spot for storing the hook and keeping it out of the way.  The handle compacts down as well for easy storage.  The scale is works out great for traveling.  It provides an easy method for weighing a bag to make sure it is under the baggage weight limit for an airplane.  The scale also is lightweight and doesnt add much extra weight to existing baggage if used for travel.  The scale is able to measure up to 110 pounds and can display the weight in grams, kilo grams, pounds or ounces.  Although I use this for weighing my bags for traveling it also easily fits into other applications such as weighing fish, food, etc.Overall, I am quite happy with this scale.  It works great, doesnt feel flimsy, gives out accurate measurements and is digital.I was supplied a sample product for review purposes, the review is my own.

This is a really great barbecue tool set.  Included are a spatula, tongs and a grill fork.  The set also comes in a nice box that makes it great for a present such as for fathers day.  All items are made of heavy duty stainless steel and are extremely durable.  Each item is roughly 16 inches long making them great for keeping your hands out of the heat while still being able to reach the back of the grill.  They also have loops on the end for hanging and easy storage.  The tools have some really nice features on them.Grill Fork: Well-built and sharp, no issues with picking up a heavy piece of meat with these.Tongs: Great oversized tongs.  The tongs have 6 teeth on one end and a flat end on the other that make grabbing and turning hot dogs and sausages an easy.  The tongs also have a metal loop that can be used for keeping the tongs shut when in storage.Spatula:  This item I love the most.  It actually has a bottle opener built into it at the top of the flat end.  On one side of the spatula is a serrated edge that is great for cutting into meat while on the other side is a flat end with saw teeth.  The front of the spatula is a contoured tip that is great for getting under meat easier.  The oversized face of the spatula makes it easy to flip burgers or steaks.Overall, I am really happy with this set.  There is nothing flimsy or cheap about it.  These are definitely comparable to high end barbecue sets in terms of quality and features.  I recommend this product and can honestly see this barbecue set lasting a long time.  I was supplied a sample product for review purposes, the review is my own.

I have had a couple of USB wall chargers, some OEM that came with the device I purchased and some aftermarket purchases due to devices I purchased not having wall chargers included. From the various wall chargers that I have gone through I have learned that I like certain things included:1) Multiple ports, multiple port wall chargers allow the ability to charge more devices at once as well carry one less charger when traveling.  Not to mention in an airport it means looking for one available outlet versus two or more.2) Enough amperage to at least charge two tablets at once.  Enough amperage means the devices can charge at normal speeds.3) Smart featured ports, meaning the USB port is able to detect the correct amperage to output for your device. Now a days newer chargers have this feature.  If the charger you are looking at doesnt have this feature move on to another one that does.4) Foldable wall plug, having a foldable plug is great for traveling and means easier packing and comfortability if it is in your pocket.5) CompactThe Anker PowerPort 2 (24W 2-Port USB Wall Charger / Travel Charger with Foldable Plug) has all the features that I want in a wall charger and more.  The wall charger is 24W which is enough to charge two iPads, two iPhones, two Samsung Tabs, or any combination of them at the same time at normal charging speeds.  But the notable difference with this wall charger compared to the many others I have gone through is that this one has Anker Voltage Boost technology, which means it can safely charge a device at faster speeds than normal. This is not noticeable on my iPhone but it is on my Samsung Tab which tends to take a long time to charge.  Not to mention it is also dual voltage, 110v/220v, a must for overseas travel.I tested this charger on my Samsung Tab and iPhone 4s at the same time.  I had no problems with compatibility and charge times were great. The wall charger is also compact, lightweight and has a foldable wall plug. Another nice thing about this wall charger is that it has smart USB ports meaning it can output 1A when an iPhone is plugged in or 2.4A when a Samsung Tab is plugged in regardless of which USB port.  A neat feature about this wall charger is the LED indicator lights.  The LEDs are green when your device is detected and charging and change to blue when it is fully charged.Overall, I am really happy with this wall charger. It works as advertised, has some value added features and is nicely priced.  This is now my new travel charger as it has much better features then the current one.  I was supplied a sample product for review purposes, the review is my own.

The Amir Charging stand for Apple Watch and iPhone is a great stand for the iPhone and Apple Watch.  If you dont have an Apple Watch this stand can still be used for a conventional watch as well.  This stand is a great way to store your phone and watch till the next morning.  The stand is well constructed of Aluminum with soft padding to keep your phone and watch from getting scratched up.  It provides a perfect viewing angle for using your iPhone while on the night stand as well.  At the back of the stand is cutout for routing cables to the phone and watch.  There is also a cutout for placing the Apple Watch charging puck into the stand.  The stand can hold the iPhone both vertically or horizontally.  I love the sleek, modern design of the stand. It looks great on my nightstand and compliments the devices nicely.Overall this is a great product and I have no qualms about recommending it to anyone looking for a stand for their devices.  Far more superior design then the similar stands made of plastic.  This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

I just got the Amir Solar Powered Flag Pole Light.  The light is solar powered and has 24 super bright LEDs that last up to 100,000 hours.  The internal batteries are charged in the morning by the 11 solar panels on top of the light.  The light has a built-in light sensor which turns on the light at dusk and shuts it off in the morning.  The light easily lasts the whole night without issue.  Installation is easy and no maintenance is required after installation.  If you do need an extension for your flagpole for installation one can be gotten at Ace Hardware for a couple bucks.Overall, this solar flag pole light is a great idea and works great.  It is super easy to install and looks great at night.  It is a much more cost effective and easier setup than running wired lighting.  Great product, recommended.  I received a coupon to purchase this item, but with no obligation to write a review.

I actually needed a food thermometer and this one has been working better than I could have imaged, definitely much better than the traditional manual thermometers.  One feature of this thermometer that I love the most is the hold button.  Its a great feature for being able to take the temperature of meats in the oven, press the hold button and then safely read the temperature.  I also love that it is digital and has an auto on / off.  Moving the stainless steel probe will turn the thermometer on or off depending on the position of the probe.  Since the thermometer is digital it does require one AAA battery, not included.  The thermometer also has an auto shut off after 10 mins which helps safe on battery life.  The response time on this thermometer is super fast as well, roughly 4 to 6 seconds to get a reading.  The Temperature Reading Range is between -58 to 572-50~300).  Changing the temperature reading between Fahrenheit or Celsius is easy with the press of a button.Overall, I have to say digital thermometers are the way to go.  Im now a fan.  I was provided a sample product for review purposes.

I ended up getting the Moonmini Stylish Ultra-thin Frosted Translucent PC Hard Case Cover Shell Skin Protector for 13 inch Apple MacBook Air - Sky Blue.  I wanted something that provided a little more protection to my MacBook.  The case is easy to install and remove.  There are vents on the bottom of the case to ensure that there is adequate air flow as well as 4 rubber feet.  The case is Sky Blue all around.  This one does not have any design aspects although Moonmimi does have some really nice cases that do have really nice designs on them already.  This case itself is great if you want something basic and low cost to protect your computer.  It is also great if you wish to use a sharpie to put designs on it yourself or even sticker it up.  It would be better to put these on a case versus the MacBook itself as it allows for easier removal and you can always get a new case to start over with self designs.Overall, this case is perfect for giving the MacBook some extra protection.  Its low cost and well constructed.  I was provided the opportunity for a free sample for review purposes.

I ended up getting the Toughshell Hard case for my MacBook Air 13in model.  I wanted something that provided a little more protection to my MacBook.Case Highlights:- Faux Leather with Great Design- Protects MacBook from scratches and scuffs- Thin and lightweight- Fits MacBook Air perfectly- Two piece design making it easy to attach and remove- Cutouts for ports on the MacBook- Comes in attractive packaging making it great as a giftOverall, I am more than impressed with the quality of the case and the case itself.  It gives a more attractive look to my MacBook as well as giving it some extra protection.  The design is beautiful and it fits my MacBook perfectly.  I was provided the opportunity for a free sample for review purposes.

This Selfie Stick from Amzdeal is a great compact selfie stick that works great.  It has a nice feel to it and is weighs roughly 6 ounces.  Compact it is roughly 8 inches long while as fully extended it is roughly 32 inches long when fully extended.  There is a U shaped clamp at the end of the stick that is used for gripping your phone. The top and bottom of the clamp there is a rubber cushion to keep your phone secure and from getting damaged. The clamp is spring loaded.  The selfie stick has a built-in rechargeable battery that lasts roughly 40 hours in operation and 96 hours on standby.Inner Clamp Measurements: from 2.25 in to 3in(If your phone has a case make sure to include that in the measurements. Below are the measurements of some phones without cases, this is to give an idea if your phone will fit within the clamps.)Phone Width Measurements:iPhone 6 Plus - 3.06inIPhone 6 - 2.64iniPhone5S - 2.31iniPhone 5C - 2.33inSamsung Galaxy S6 Edge - 2.76inSamsung Galaxy S6 - 2.78inSamsung Galaxy S4 - 2.74inThe U shaped clamp has 180 degrees of motion.  This makes it easier to get the angle of a shot that you want with the Selfie Stick. There is a handle on the side of the clamp to tighten the tension of the clamp in moving forwards and backwards. The U-clamp does not rotate from landscape to portrait mode. If you wish to take a picture in portrait mode though you can just rotate the selfie stick as a whole, which works just as good and in my opinion is a lot less work and quicker then making adjustments with the clamp.This is a Bluetooth Selfie Stick and pairing is straightforward and easy.  No issues were encountered pairing the stick with my iPhone 4s.  The operation button is perfectly placed on the end of the handle.  This button is used to power on the stick, pair the stick as well as take the picture. At the bottom of the stick is the micro USB charging port (cable included) and screw connector for attaching a carbineer hook or wristlet.Overall, I am quick pleased with this selfie stick. It works great, easy to use, compact enough to easily carry in a purse or bag and is a great design.I was provided a sample product for testing purposes.

This is a multi-functional device that acts as a MP3 player, SD Card Reader, USB Flash Drive Reader and FM Transmitter.  Music can be played via the device to your car speakers from a 3.5mm connection, SD card or USB Flash drive.  There is a USB plug on the device that can be used to read a USB flash drive to access music as well as charge or power a device at 1A output.  The device then uses the built-in FM transmitter to relay the music to your car speakers.  No issues with static or noise from the FM transmitter and there are enough channel selections available to allow for crisp clean sound without interference.  The device also comes with a remote control for easier control.  There is an LCD screen on the device as well that makes it easier to sort through and play music. The device is able to read SD cards or USB flash drives with a capacity up to 32 GB.  I tried an 8 GB flash drive and had no issues with capability.Overall, this is a great device that acts as an extension to your car stereo and gives it the ability to play music from different formats.  No issues so far, great find.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.If my review found helpful I appreciate clicking the "Yes" link below.

The Aukey TripLink WD-N1 is a great all in one device.  It is a portable wireless router, NAS with media streaming capability, SD reader / writer and a 3000 mAh portable battery pack.In my opinion the best feature of the WD-N1 is the ability for it to function as a NAS.  You can plug in a hard drive either desktop or portable, a flash drive or a SD card and be able to share it wirelessly to your Android or Apple devices.  Instead of transferring movies or music to your device you can access them wirelessly via the WD-N1.  This allows for increased storage for your device as well as instant access, no more having to copy them to your actually device to access files.  There is a free Android and Apple App that allows for easier management and access of the WD-N1.Other Notable Features:- Compatible with Android and IOS devices- Ability to read portable hard drives, flash drives and micro SD cards and act as a portable NAS. I have used flash drives from 2GB to 32GB, various sized SD cards and a 2 TB Western digital portable hard drive all without issues.- Ability to transfer files between connected devices via the WD-N1- Ability to be connected to the WD-N1 and still browse the internet- 3000 mAh portable battery to recharge devices or power a portable hard drive.- No lag when accessing media from the WD-N1 as well as the ability for to stream files to multiple devices at onceSome things to be aware of:- Does not come with a wall charger although a USB charging cable is included and any USB wall charger should work to power or recharge the WD-N1.Overall, this is a great device to have. Not only is it a portable battery pack which is really convenient in itself it also gives you the ability to access storage on the go. This product is so versatile and has so much functionality that this review just barely touches on it. You really have to try it out to really appreciate it. This device is really great to have on long trips or at home to share media easier between devices.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.If my review found helpful I appreciate clicking the "Yes" link below.

This is a review for the Amzdeal Chrome-polished Brass Thermostatic Throttle Valve for Touchless Temperature Sensor Faucet/ Hot Cold Water Mixing Valve.  If you have a touchless facet and do not have a mixing value built-in to the facet then this would be needed in order to set the water temperature.  Some touchless facets include a mixing value in the body of the faucet while as some do not.The mixing value allows the ability to change the mix of cold and hot water by turning the value right or left 1/3 of a turn.  The value can be set on all cold, all hot or in between.  This value is not just for touchless facets and has other uses as well.  It would act as a great safety feature for kids to prevent them from setting the water too hot on the facet.  Although, the value is made for sink water supply hoses so it wont work in an application for a washing machine.  The value does have backflow preventers for both inlets. The mixing value is really easy to install and shouldnt take more than an hour for a completed install. Once installed just set the water temperature on the value and all set.  The mixing value has been working out great thus far.Package Includes:- Temperature Mixing Valve- Rubber Gaskets- Supply lines are not includedSpecification:- Control: Cold, Open, Hot or Off- Inlet: RED: hot -  in, BLUE: cold -  in- Outlet: Composition  in- Solid brass construction- Very easy to installI was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.If my review found helpful I appreciate clicking the "Yes" link below.

This is a review for the TaoTronic TT-BZ001 Insect Bug Zapper. The item comes in a cardboard box and is securely packed inside. The bug zapper comes pre-assembled and can be used straight out of the box. The design is typical for a bug zapper. The housing is mostly made of aluminum but has black plastic sides. The bottom has a slide out tray that is easily removable for cleaning. The metal grates on the bug zapper can be removed as well and the bulbs are also replaceable. Although, the bulbs are rated for 8000 hours of operation so they should last quite a while. Included with the bug zapper is a metal chain that can be used for hanging the bug zapper on a hook, it can be mounted as well on the wall or just placed on a table. If mounting or hanging the bug zapper an extension cord maybe required. The power cord for the bug zapper is roughly 3 feet long which can pose an issue if the outlet is at ground level.What's in the box.TaoTronic Insect Bug ZapperHanging ChainWall mount attachment and 2 screwsCleaning brushOverall, I am quite happy with the bug zapper. It is better alternative than using fly traps and sprays. It is a slim design bug zapper, lightweight and doesnt take up much space at all. This bug zapper is also quiet and doesnt make the buzzing sound when turned on. Great item for a more bug free summer.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.If my review found helpful I appreciate clicking the "Yes" link below.

I love Bluetooth earbuds for exercising. I got the Mpow Swift Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Sport Headphones in Green. Part of the earbud is green and the wire is green as well. I feel that the green helps with standing out a little bit more when running outside.The earphones feature Bluetooth 4.0 technology and last roughly five hours per charge. The microphone is built into the earphone versus being midway on the cord. This design doesn't add extra weight to just one side of the cord and doesn't pull the earphone from the ear when running. The earphones come with multiple sized ear hooks and ear buds which ensure the ability to get a snug and comfortable fit. Pairing is easy and straightforward.So far these have been working out great. I haven't had any issues from sweat shorting out the earphones. They are actually advertised as being sweetproof. Sound quality is great; these actually get pretty loud with my iPhone 4s. Even though microphone placement is on the actual earbud it hasn't had an impact on the opposite end being able to hear me clearly. These are super lightweight and have a flat cord versus a rounded one; you dont even notice that the cord is behind your neck. It does take some time to get use to the controls as they are on the earbud itself. The controls are on the headset are for answering a call, ending a call, declining a call, redialing, mute and playing music. The headset can also be paired to two phones at the same time. A micro USB to USB cable is included but not a wall adapter for charging the headset.Specifications:Bluetooth Standard: Bluetooth V4.0Frequency Range: 2.4GHzOperation: Class 2Bluetooth Mode: Headset/Hands-free/A2DP/AVRCPRange: Up to 30ftTalk/Play Time: Up to 5 hrsStandby Time: Up to 185 hrsCharging Time: 2 hrsJust for making exercising and listening to music all that more pleasant I rate these 5 stars. They work as advertised and are super easy to setup.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

This is definitely not a cheaply made armband for the iPhone. I have gone through a couple of different arm bands, and this one is one of the ones Im most impressed with the most. Armbands are great when working out, unless youre using Bluetooth headsets having an armband is the next best thing. It keeps your iPhone secure as well as a key (gym key, car key or house key). Yes, the armband has a slot to secure your key as well.The armband is a really nice and I love the feel of it. The iPhone 6 (4.7in version) fits perfectly although if you have a really big case then you may run into issues. I tried this also with my iPhone 4s and it fit as well, although the iPhone 4s is smaller so wasn't expecting any issues there. The arm band has some really nice built-in features that you do not always find on arm bands such as a key holder as well as being reflective. The reflective material is around the boarder of the screen cover as well as on the armband. The clear plastic screen cover keeps the iPhone from getting wet and keeps it secure in the arm band. I have a tempered glass screen protector on my phone and didn't have any issue with responsiveness of my iPhone. The rest of the armband is made up of a soft leather like material with a neoprene wrap and Velcro band. There are two different slots for band which allows for a more snug and secure fit. Not to mention an additional extension strap is included if needed. The feel of the armband around the arm is comfortable and the material works well for staying dry. The armband is also really lightweight and not stiff at all. Overall, great product and feature wise one of the better armbands I have tried.I was provided a sample for review purpose and the review is my own.

Unless you have an AUX port in your car or a Bluetooth enabled car trying to play music from your mobile phone, iPad or iPod to your car speakers isn't possible.  Well not possible without the use of a car adapter or an FM Transmitter such as the MPOW Streambot OVAL FM Transmitter.The FM Transmitter is easier to use then trying to setup Bluetooth.  On the FM transmitter is a 3.5mm cable that you plug into the audio jack on your device.  Synch up the FM station your stereo with the FM Station on the transmitter and that's it.  The FM transmitter has a connected car charger that has a 2.1A USB port that can be used to charge your actual device, tablet or other device.The FM transmitter has enough stations to choose from to ensure that interference does not occur.  I have had previous experiences with FM transmitters that sometimes there is a buzzing sound on the speakers.  Do not notice the same issue with this transmitter.  This FM transmitter is also able to provide hands-free conversations via the car speakers although I haven't tried this out as I'm using my old iPod with the FM transmitter.Overall, great FM transmitter.  The sound quality is great, easy to use, no interference as well as the ability for hands-free calling.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

This is a great find.  Typically for the cost of the 5-Pack Micro USB RAVPower Cables you would only be getting a single cable. This item is 5 different sized Micro USB to USB cables.  Included are one 1ft cable, two 3ft cables, one 6ft cable and one 10ft cable.  The cables come in a nicely designed box and are packaged in plastic bags.  The gauge of the cable is similar to the gauge of cables on wired mice.  I tried out all the cables and all the connections fit nicely. No issues to report.I was provided a sample product for testing and review purposes.

The RAVPower Lightning to USB 3ft cable is the first lightning cable I have used that is constructed with PTFE.  I actually had to look up PTFE to figure out what it was.  PTFE is better known as Teflon.  The other things great about this cable are the thicker and sturdier cable joints, shielding, and the 5000+ bend-test.  This is important as cables tend to have issues at the cable joints.  My older lightning cable actually had that issue and you could see the colored wires, of course this one replaced it.  On the shielding, I know with CAT5 (Ethernet Cabling) shielding does help with interference.  I am assuming the shielding in this lightning cable provides the same benefit.  With all these enhancements that cable is still flexible which is great. I do not like stiff cables as it makes it hard for cable management.  The cable is also 3ft long which makes it a perfect length for use with power banks.  Im using my cable with my iPhone 5c and it has been working great no issues as of yet.  Charging and synching work as it should, it is Apple MFI certified which ensures compatibility.  If you are looking for an aftermarket cable it is best to stick with the Apple MFI certified cables.Overall, I am happy with this cable. I like the enhancements that RAVPower has made to the cable and expect it to last a long time compared to past Apple and aftermarket lightning cables.  If any issues arise I will be sure to update this review and the rating. But so far so good so 5 stars as the cable works as advertised.I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.

The things that I like about the Anker PowerCore 13000 is that it can put out a max of 4 Amps combined between the two USB ports. If you are charging a phone and tablet this is more then enough. If you are charging two tablets they will charge a little slower then using the OEM charger. Tablets tend to charge in a range of 2.1A to 2.4A depending on the brand while phones typically at 1A. The capacity of the power bank is more than enough to fully recharge the typical phone and tablet. This device has PowerIQ and VoltageBoost built-in. You will not find these technologies on all power banks so I would confirm first. PowerIQ combined with VoltageBoost allows for your device to recharge quicker then it normally would. VoltageBoost is great to have when you are trying to recharge a tablet since they tend to have larger capacity batteries then phones and take longer to recharge. VoltageBoost seems like a fairly new technology to power banks so not all offer it. I have just started seeing the newer power banks coming out offering this kind of technology.Overall, this is a great power bank for the money. It has a matte finish so it helps in gripping, comes with a carrying case and USB cable to recharge the device (you do need your own wall charger), compact for the capacity and from a manufacturer who has past experience with power banks.I was supplied a sample for testing purposes and I promise my review is completely honest and fair. If you found my review helpful, please vote Yes. If it did not help, please leave a comment saying how I can improve my review before clicking "No." I am always trying to improve my reviewing process and am always open to ideas. Thanks!What You Get: Anker PowerCore 13000 Portable Charger, Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide.

The air vent mount is an alternative to the suction dash mount. Both designs can have their downfalls and advantages. Its all more of a preference of at what angle, height and distance you prefer your phone to be at and what will best fit the design of the vehicle.The Xenomix Air Vent Car Phone Mount Holder Cradle model HD-C8 is a nicely designed product. It is a straightforward design that counts down on extra weight of the mount.  Since this mount attaches to the air vent of the vehicle you don't want a mount that is pretty lightweight, which this one is.Before purchasing an air vent mount I would suggest looking at the air vents in your car first. For instance, the air vents in my Toyota Truck are slanted and not overly loose. With slanted meaning that the bottom of the air vent is closer to me and the top father away. This design helps the air vents to stay in place. Air vents that are overly loose or designed flat may not be such a good fit for an air vent mount as the weight may cause the air vents to move down affecting the mount.  Although, the best test to see if your vehicle is compatible with an air vent is trying it out.The Xenomix air vent works by utilizing a clamp that grasps onto one of the fins in the air vent in your car. The clamp opens up roughly 4.5 inches wide.  If your phone is more then 4.5 inches wide then it will not fit. It has a ball joint that allows for 360 degree operation allowing for either landscape or portrait view on your phone. There are rubber cushions on the arms that clamp around the phone will in the mount which provide against damaging your phone. Installation of the mount is as simple as it can get and is straightforward.  The design is also a simplistic one but very functional.  This is not one of your bulky vents that is an eye sore.Overall, how well this vent mount works will depend wholly on the design of the vents in your car. My experience with the vent was problem free and this type of mount design is an alternative to the dash mount.  I do like this mount more then the previous ones I have tried as it allows for placement on the left side or right side of the steering wheel, air vents are typically  in these locations.  It is also not bulky and doesn't take up much space or restrict air flow from the vent.I was provided a sample for review and I do not promise a good rating in return, nor am I affiliated with this company or compensated in any way.

This is a review for the Ancheer AN-SH002 4-setting handheld shower head and the shower head holder.  Installation is easy of both is straightforward and easy.  Just screw the old showerhead, screw on the shower head holder (use Teflon tape), connect the end of your stainless steel or plastic shower hose to the end of the shower head.  If you would like you can use Teflon tape on all the connections for a more leak free connection.  Make sure not to over tighten the connection as this can warp the gasket inside of the shower hose.  For my setup I have a stainless steel shower hose installed with this shower head.  Both the hose and shower head are silver so they pair nicely together.  This mount allows for having both a fixed and handheld showerhead.To change the shower head setting, all that is needed is turning the head until you hear a click.  The 4 settings are marked to easily identify which one you are on. Each setting worked nicely and neither of them restricted water follow in any way.  None of the shower settings feels like being pelted by needles, which is a major plus.  One of the pictures of the item gives a good depiction of the different settings.Overall, I do like this shower head.  It does work better then the one that it replaced and does not leak at all.  The settings are nice and it is pleasant to have a change when showering.  Also it comes with a reusable eco-bag that can be used for groceries, etc.I was provided a sample product for testing and review purposes

This is a review for the Ancheer 2 meter (6 foot) stainless steel shower hose. Installation is easy and straightforward. Both ends of the hose have rubber gaskets to prevent leaks. When installing mine I used some plumbing tape for the connections. This is a force of habit and from the look of the connectors you may be able to get away with not using the plumbing tape. Although, be sure to not over tighten the connectors as this can squash the internal gasket and create the potential for leaks. The end connectors are metal and not made of plastic. The hose is great and doesn't restrict water pressure, water pressure is actually quite adequate. I have had some hoses that had a thinner inside diameter for the hose which affected water pressure.This is a stainless steel hose so it doesn't have the same downsides of plastic hoses. The stainless steel hose does have weight to it compared to plastic hoses. It is not flimsy at all and is pretty flexible. It hangs straight down and I have yet to experience issues with kinks. I have experienced other stainless steel hoses show specks of rust on the hose itself but have not noticed that issue with this hose. Currently it is priced at $9.99 which is inline with the cost of comparable hoses and a little bit lower in price than others.Overall, I have no complaints. The shower hose works as advertised, looks great and I expect it to last quite a while.I was provided a sample product for review purpose and the review is my own.

Selfie sticks have been around for quite some time now.  You have probably seen people out and around tourist spots using them.  Selfie sticks are convenient especially if you want to be in the picture you are taking and have actually have more then just you head show up in the picture.  They are easy to use and pretty lightweight.The design of the selfie stick has stayed pretty constant while mobile phones have been adding more feature rich camera options.  This selfie stick has been updated and has all the functions of the older versions and more.  Namely the ability to zoom in and out and switch between the back and front cameras.  This selfie stick also has one more very differing feature.  Instead of using Bluetooth or a cable for the selfie stick and the mobile phone to communicate, this one uses some sort of ultrasonic control.  The selfie stick paired with the FREE IOS or Android App allows you to easily take pictures.The selfie sticks arm is extendable up to 39 inches, which is more than enough. When the selfie stick is collapsed it is 9.25 inches long.  I have used the selfie stick with my iPhone 4s only so far and it has been working great.  The zoom buttons on the stick come in handy and it is super easy to setup and use.  When the phone is in the holder it seems secure, not like it will be falling out or at all loose. The holder for the phone has soft rubber grips that use springs to keep tension on the phone while in the holder. The handle of the stick as well has a different design then the typical black cylinderal shape of other selfie sticks. The selfie stick comes with a hand strap that is attachable to the bottom of the stick if you wish to use it.  A mirror is also included and it's installation is optional.  The purpose of the mirror is so that you can use the front camera of your mobile phone versus just the back to take pictures. I prefer using the mobile phone screen versus the included mirror but that is just my preference.The selfie stick has an internal rechargeable battery that can be charged by the included micro USB cable. A USB wall adapter is not included but any USB wall adapter can be used as well as the USB ports on your computer to recharge the stick. Charging is pretty fast and takes roughly under 30 minutes.Overall, I am quite happy with the selfie stick. It has been holding up well and is small and lightweight making it great for travel and actually being in the photos.  The zoom features in itself make this selfie stick worth buying over others.I was supplied a sample review product for test and evaluation purposes.

From past experience stainless steel measuring spoons are a lot better purchase then plastic. Though not all stainless steel products are created equal. I have had in the past some items that were stainless steel, advertised not to rust, yet end up rusting. So far after a week of using these spoons, having them in the sink and in a humid environment they have not rusted. Where I live can be humid at times which doesnt help with preventing items from rusting.The design of these spoons is simple yet efficient. They are a set of 5 (1 tbsp/15 ml, 1/2 tbsp/7.5 ml, 1 tsp/5 ml, 1/2 tsp/2.5 ml and 1/4 tsp/1.25 ml). On the front arm of the spoon is the measurement in TSP and ML, so no calculations needed for conversion. The end of the spoon is round and allows for easy measurements. The arm of the spoon is also long enough to fit in deep jars without any trouble. The spoons come with a snap ring which makes it easy to add and remove a spoon to the bunch without any hassle. The snap ring helps prevent misplacing a spoon. Since these are stainless steel they are easy to clean and dont get stained like plastic measuring spoons some time do.Needless to say, I am very happy with this measuring set. If you are looking for some stainless steel measuring spoons that are nicely priced and thoughtfully designed these maybe for you.I was provided a sample product for review purposes.

The Anker PowerPort 10 Multi-Port USB Charger is a great replacement to the single USB chargers. It has 10 USB Charging ports that should more than meet the needs of any power hungry device. All 10 ports have power and voltage boost as well as Smart IQ capability. What this means is faster charging for your devices. The device is 60w with the USB ports being able to charge up to 2.4A per port. This means that this device is able to charge portable speakers, iPhones, iPads, Samsung Tablets, and more all at the same time. There is no need to look at the USB ports on the device to find out whether the port outputs 1A, 2.1A or 2.4A. Any port can be used and the device itself will determine the correct output for your device.  This is a lot more user friendly and convenient than having a USB charger that has a port that is only able to output a specific amperage versus being versatile like the Anker PowerPort device.The device is also super compact for having 10 USB ports.  I have seen and had USB chargers that have less ports and are more bulkier than this one. In fact 10 ports is probably overkill but having more ports available doesn't hurt anything. The device comes with a removable 5ft power cord. This is a typical power cord and not doesn't have a bulky power brick attached to it. This allows for easier cable management and a cleaner setup. A strip of Velcro is also included to aid in wrapping up the power cord. This device also has an off/on switch on the back of the device. I like this aspect a lot as I like having the ability to shut off the device if it's not being used. Using the on/off button is a lot easier then unplugging it from the power strip.  Not only USB chargers have this built-in convenience.I tested this charger with the iPhone 4s, iTouch, a portable battery pack, Bluetooth headset and Samsung Tablet with all charging without issues. I did notice that the devices recharged faster then normal. The device doesn't overheat and stays relatively cool while in use. It is also dual voltage, 110v/240v , which makes it perfect for traveling.Overall, I am impressed with this charger and will be replacing my current one with this one.  No issues to report.  It is a great economical USB charging station. It is a perfect alternative for replacing single port chargers and compatible with a multitude of USB devices.I was supplied a sample review product for test and evaluation purposes.

This is a review for the OxyLED BL30 Bright Rechargeable LED Bike Light Set. This set includes the first USB chargeable batteries I have ever tried. I like that they have the USB connector port built-in and that all you have to do is plug them in to a wall adapter. I already have USB wall chargers in the house so it wasnt a big deal that a wall adapter is not included. The detachable front flashlight uses the USB rechargeable battery. There are two USB rechargeable batteries included so they can be easily swapped out when needed. An adapter for using three AAA batteries with the flashlight is also included if you wish to use those types of batteries instead. while The 2 rear tail lights use CR2032 batteries. CR2032 batteries arent expensive and can be purchased in any watch section of a store typically. The rear tail light is water sealed and has rubber washers to aid in keeping moisture out.I do like that the front light is removable and can be used as a standalone flashlight as well. The light is made of aluminum and wont get damaged beyond use if it is dropped or knocked around. I actually removed the included lanyard from the flashlight so its not in the way when the flashlight is mounted. Installation of the lights is super easy and removal of the front light once mounted easy as well. The bulbs on both the front and back lights are LED and are bright. Both front and rear lights have the option of high beam, low beam, strobe or off. The front light also has the option of adjusting the width of the beam to wide or narrow.I have no complaints at all and am actually quite impressed by the thoughtfulness of the design of the product. This must have been designed by an avid biker as everything that you could wish for is built-in to this product. Great find.I was provided a sample product for review purposes.

I got this for my husband's shed.  We have a wood shed that is shaped like a barn, but the problem is there is no elecricity that runs out there.  So when we go out to the shed to get something, or if my husband is just needing to work out there on the mower, etc, he has no light.  Even during the daytime, the back of the shed, you still need light in it.This stick on motion sensor light was the perfect solution for our problem.  It comes with a sticky label type thing, that sticks to the back of the LED light and then to the wall or wherever you choose to put it.  It also comes with mounting brackets and screws, which is what we chose to do to put it up in our shed.  We applied it to the back wall on the shed, and now when he opens the door to the shed, the light shines on.  I was surprised at how well this lit up the shed.  The LED's on this night light are really bright.  I am kind of jealous now that I gave it to my husband for the shed, because I would love to have it in the house.  I may just have to purchase another one for me.  Great job by BYBlight on this.  Please know that everything that I have written about this product is how I really feel about it and you can read my reviews with confidence.  A sample of this product was provided for testing and review.

I own several pairs of headphones, and so I had high hopes for this set.  I do like that they are a certified product, as some of the headphones and devices that you get can let's just say be not safe for your phones.I don't like the way these fit in my ear they were very uncomfortable.  I would say that my ears are a normal size and I don't normally have any problems wearing headphones.  However, this set kept falling out.  I tried wearing them where they just kind of hung on my ear, but even then they were uncomfortable.  The sound quality on the set, I would say is ok.  Not fantastic, but a decent sound from them.  I will be gifting this set to my grandchildren.  They go through headphones quicker than most people go through socks.  Please know that everything that I have written about this product is how I really feel about it and you can read my reviews with confidence.  A sample provided at a promotional discount for testing and review

I am loving this wrap by Aircee!  I just started getting into scarves and wraps last year, so this year I am really adding to my collection.  I love the colors on this wrap.  I can wear this with just about anything in my wardrobe and it will compliment my outfit.The size of this wrap is perfect for using as a shawl for a nice cool Fall day, or on a colder day, wearing it as a scarf.  I wish I could describe to you the material on this shawl.  It is sooo soft!  I have ran it through the washer and dryer to see how it would launder. This was a lifesaver for me and my best friend.  She had just came home from the hospital after having been in the ICU and we were dealing with some horrible situation.  She has stage 1 kidney failure and as a result, she doesn't realize when she is urinating. We had been using puppy pads, but as you can imagine , those didn't really last long and get expensive having to replace them. In 2007, I was highly skeptical of anything related to horoscopes, tarot card readings, and astrology. I believed that your fate is controlled by your own actions and choices, and horoscopes were just for entertainment. That view changed when in 2008, after having gone through a major turmoil in life, I decided to pick up Suzanne White's "Chinese Astrology: Plain and Simple" (Paperback) for reasons I do not exactly remember. What I do remember was that I wanted to learn more about myself -- Who am I? What's my purpose? How can I get better? How can I turn my misfortunes around?Reading that book's section about Dragons, it gave me an idea of what kind of person I may be and who I may become. It helped me understand what I needed to work on, what positives to bring out of myself, and what negatives to work on and be aware of. I thought, "Why not? Doesn't hurt", even though I did not believe in anything astrology. The very same year, I also met a friend who did Tarot card readings for fun. Short story: every single one of her predictions came true. Every single one of them. There have been some who were skeptical every time I share my story, but none were able to disprove how she could have possibly known some of the things she told me about that only I could have known. She made me open my mind more towards the unscientific side of things, and with that, I read more of "Chinese Astrology: Plain and Simple". I was able to nearly accurately guess someone's Chinese zodiac based on the characteristics outlined in the book. Women were amazed by that knowledge, and it opened up dialogues and intrigue. It also helped me understand which types of women were a better match for me, ultimately resulting in meeting the woman who I now call my wife, a Horse sign.I was so intrigued with the book, I also bought Suzanne's other ones: "The New Chinese Astrology", "Guide to Love", "The New Astrology". Unfortunately, I haven't been a fan of the "The New Astrology" or "The New Chinese Astrology". I'm not sure why. "Chinese Astrology: Plain and Simple" (CA: P&S) was still the most accurate as relating to my own life, and "The New Chinese Astrology" did not appear to have the same feeling or pull as the original. Perhaps this may have been due to me not giving those books the same chance as I did with "CA: P&S", or perhaps those books became less helpful to me as I had already started turning my turmoil around for the positive. "Guide to Love", though I own it, was never read. This is not a ding on Suzanne's books -- they are most likely filled with wonderful readings, but they just weren't for me at the time."CA: P&S" is still my favorite, go-to guide today due to the impact it made on my life in 2008. Perhaps it will help you figure out who you are too and who you may become. In all, I do suggest the same thing I tell my friends: a book alone will likely not be sufficient to help you achieve this goal. Dare I say, but the "stars" must align in your life as you read the book. In my case, it was the combination of the "CA: P&S" book, the tarot card reading friend, meeting another friend who has similar "powers" as the tarot card reading one, a strong willingness to find out who I was and how to improve myself, a major turmoil in my life, and coming across all the different people I could apply the new knowledge to and share with. All these combined contributed to me becoming who I am today, and I have Suzanne White much to thank for that. My life became better indirectly as a result of her writings.Use this book not as a "bible" or rule book, but as a GUIDE to HELP you with your choices. Bad things are bound to happen in your life, such as 2012: it was a particularly bad one for me as 80% of the year was filled with nothing but bad luck, both personally and at work, prompting my coworker to exclaim that a permanent, black cloud was over my head that year. We laughed every time "yet another bad thing" came up. It was too surreal. But what I have learned over the years: things DO happen for a reason. You only get stronger and better from each experience, especially if you look at life at a more positive angle, no matter how bad things get. I survived that very bad 2012 knowing that things could only get better later. Indeed it did.
